story:
Short Summary

  • Hi!! Thank you for stopping at our page.  I, Michael a US Navy veteran,  currently own and operate a local market. The land we would like to develop was in a distressed state when purchased.  Even then the serenity and beauty of the area was clearly seen but the town and surrounding area needs attention.  The local market we now operate was on the brink of closure thus continuing the downward projection of development and opportunity in this rural desert community.  We couldn't allow the only market in town to close and so took on the ownership and management.  The market is now a pride of the community but still a small portion of what is needed.   
  • The only store in town.  We understand the lack of opportunity present in the area which is causing a burden on the community and the local government.  There is nature tourism but it mostly passes through this unique town of Ranchita.  Ranchita has a lot to offer and much room to grow in order to support the community.
  • We have invested all our savings into the local market but we can't stop there.  The project vision is possible with community support and capital.  We have spread the word to the community and they love it, all that is left is to raise funds to get the project started and the community working.  North Mountain area of San Diego County is breathtaking.  Amazing views, great weather, and untapped potential.  Secret gem for those within and outside the county as a place to visit and relish the outdoors.  But lacking in many ways for the residents of this rural desert community hoping to stay but unable to find stable work  or bright future for the community.  This project will create opportunity for the community while preserving and enhancing nature tourism.This  project fits right in with the county future plans for sustainable smart agriculture to both develop and maintain the local characteristic.   When our business becomes fully operational the profits will feed into a private foundation dedicated  community development projects.  These projects will focus on education, local commerce business development, and sustainable infrastructure. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • This project will need to be funded in phases.  The first phase is the design and planting.  This phase will primarily consist of engineering drawing plans, government zone permitting, tree planting, fresh water fish ponds.
    • We know the main features but experts are needed to provide specific guidance.  We want everything that will be built or grown on the orchard to mesh well with the local vegetation and in no way adversely affect the ecosystem. $30,000
    • The government is a huge hurtle for everything and we have done our research on what can be done without major permits and what is required.  The use of caves for lodging we believe is required in order to preserve the vast unhampered views of the desert.  But it will also be a challenge permitting wise.  We will need structural engineers working with the building department.  $60,000
    • Good thing we don't need permission to plant trees.  We have a nursery of trees but we are no where close to what will be needed to cover 60 acres.  Tree planting coincides with the pond creation for the fish and shellfish.   $500,000 for trees, $100,000 for ponds.
      •  
      • The fresh water fish and shellfish we plan to rear are  prawns, crabs, and whitefish.  This will be semi-intensive with focus on locally sourced fish feed.  This means that we intend to either grow the ingredients needed to supplement the natural ecosystem within the pond or support a local farmer to become part of the supply chain.  Our ponds will not be crammed and the water serves as a natural fertilizer for the near-by trees.  This is a system of systems operation.
      •  
      • We have two locations which affords us the opportunity to grow slightly different climate trees and shrubs that will be used to make both alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages. Ranchita is a cooler climate so the trees will be mostly fruit and nut trees that require a defined cold season.  All must be drought tolerant.  Our main nursery location is in Ramona which is a bit warmer.  This is where we will start the young trees and also grow subtropical trees for beverages and other products.
  • We truly appreciate your time and interest.  This project is unique and  just bubbling with love and good times. Our perks will be the same, a project you will have the ability to be part of, own a piece of and experience the gratitude we have to offer.  Thank you   
  • If we are unable to reach our goals we will still move on with the project.  It would takes us longer and probably include selling some portion of the project but the goal is solid and we plan to reach it.

The Impact

Your contribution will not only change my life but the the lives of over 3,000 people that call the this North Mountain area of San Diego their home.  This outdoor destination project is the catalyst to uplift the community and improve the economic outlook.   

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk and challenge for this project is government approval.  Originally when we started we thought that maybe the locals might not want this in their neighborhood, because it is a very rural town with no commercial business besides the market.  But we were wrong.  The more locals we spoke to the more we realized they want this project just as much as we do.   Owning a market has opened my eyes to the battles with permitting and licensing.  Its not for the faint at heart.  But seeing that our vision aligns with the county's future development plan we are positive on the outcome.  The key is to be tenacious and consistent.  We've learned so much from operating the market.  The government rules and regulations are meant to help and its best to keep positive, ask lots of questions, and don't stop calling for status updates.  It helps :D

The next biggest risk is the wildfire danger.  This a very real and present threat that we are very aware of and plan to design into the layout of the orchard possible ways to minimize damage and increase recovery.  Fire prevention and defense will be designed into our orchard layout, we will work with a specialist to provide guidance and advice.

Other Ways You Can Help

We truly hope you can contribute.  But if you are unable to please share our project, follow us on Instagram, or like our page on Facebook.

Short Summary


Hi!! Thank you for stopping at our page.  I, Michael a US Navy veteran,  currently own and operate a local market. The land we would like to develop was in a distressed state when purchased.  Even then the serenity and beauty of the area was clearly seen but the town and surrounding area needs attention.  The local market we now operate was on the brink of closure thus continuing the downward projection of development and opportunity in this rural desert community.  We couldn't allow the only market in town to close and so took on the ownership and management.  The market is now a pride of the community but still a small portion of what is needed.   

The only store in town.  We understand the lack of opportunity present in the area which is causing a burden on the community and the local government.  There is nature tourism but it mostly passes through this unique town of Ranchita.  Ranchita has a lot to offer and much room to grow in order to support the community.

We have invested all our savings into the local market but we can't stop there.  The project vision is possible with community support and capital.  We have spread the word to the community and they love it, all that is left is to raise funds to get the project started and the community working.  North Mountain area of San Diego County is breathtaking.  Amazing views, great weather, and untapped potential.  Secret gem for those within and outside the county as a place to visit and relish the outdoors.  But lacking in many ways for the residents of this rural desert community hoping to stay but unable to find stable work  or bright future for the community.  This project will create opportunity for the community while preserving and enhancing nature tourism.This  project fits right in with the county future plans for sustainable smart agriculture to both develop and maintain the local characteristic.   When our business becomes fully operational the profits will feed into a private foundation dedicated  community development projects.  These projects will focus on education, local commerce business development, and sustainable infrastructure. 



 
What We Need & What You Get

This project will need to be funded in phases.  The first phase is the design and planting.  This phase will primarily consist of engineering drawing plans, government zone permitting, tree planting, fresh water fish ponds.
We know the main features but experts are needed to provide specific guidance.  We want everything that will be built or grown on the orchard to mesh well with the local vegetation and in no way adversely affect the ecosystem. $30,000

The government is a huge hurtle for everything and we have done our research on what can be done without major permits and what is required.  The use of caves for lodging we believe is required in order to preserve the vast unhampered views of the desert.  But it will also be a challenge permitting wise.  We will need structural engineers working with the building department.  $60,000

Good thing we don't need permission to plant trees.  We have a nursery of trees but we are no where close to what will be needed to cover 60 acres.  Tree planting coincides with the pond creation for the fish and shellfish.   $500,000 for trees, $100,000 for ponds.

 
The fresh water fish and shellfish we plan to rear are  prawns, crabs, and whitefish.  This will be semi-intensive with focus on locally sourced fish feed.  This means that we intend to either grow the ingredients needed to supplement the natural ecosystem within the pond or support a local farmer to become part of the supply chain.  Our ponds will not be crammed and the water serves as a natural fertilizer for the near-by trees.  This is a system of systems operation.

 
We have two locations which affords us the opportunity to grow slightly different climate trees and shrubs that will be used to make both alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages. Ranchita is a cooler climate so the trees will be mostly fruit and nut trees that require a defined cold season.  All must be drought tolerant.  Our main nursery location is in Ramona which is a bit warmer.  This is where we will start the young trees and also grow subtropical trees for beverages and other products.






We truly appreciate your time and interest.  This project is unique and  just bubbling with love and good times. Our perks will be the same, a project you will have the ability to be part of, own a piece of and experience the gratitude we have to offer.  Thank you   

If we are unable to reach our goals we will still move on with the project.  It would takes us longer and probably include selling some portion of the project but the goal is solid and we plan to reach it.

The Impact

Your contribution will not only change my life but the the lives of over 3,000 people that call the this North Mountain area of San Diego their home.  This outdoor destination project is the catalyst to uplift the community and improve the economic outlook.   

Risks & Challenges
The biggest risk and challenge for this project is government approval.  Originally when we started we thought that maybe the locals might not want this in their neighborhood, because it is a very rural town with no commercial business besides the market.  But we were wrong.  The more locals we spoke to the more we realized they want this project just as much as we do.   Owning a market has opened my eyes to the battles with permitting and licensing.  Its not for the faint at heart.  But seeing that our vision aligns with the county's future development plan we are positive on the outcome.  The key is to be tenacious and consistent.  We've learned so much from operating the market.  The government rules and regulations are meant to help and its best to keep positive, ask lots of questions, and don't stop calling for status updates.  It helps :D

The next biggest risk is the wildfire danger.  This a very real and present threat that we are very aware of and plan to design into the layout of the orchard possible ways to minimize damage and increase recovery.  Fire prevention and defense will be designed into our orchard layout, we will work with a specialist to provide guidance and advice.

Other Ways You Can Help

We truly hope you can contribute.  But if you are unable to please share our project, follow us on Instagram, or like our page on Facebook.

story:
The World Smallest 3 Sockets Travel Adapter

InnoTRA launched 1 To 3 in 2018, which is the world’s smallest travel adapter. With three US sockets can charge three devices at the same time.

 

 

The product inspiration came from the need to charge multiple devices at once. This gadget is not only an universal adapter, it also serves as an outlet extension allowing user to connect up to 3 devices simultaneously!

 

   

 

This adapter is the best accessory to bring with your travel because of its fashionable looks, innovative, thin and easy-to-carry design. 

 

    

 

With this universal adapter with 4 different plug types and 3 US sockets, you can travel without concerning the different plug types used in various countries and have the convenience to charge 3 devices at once.

 

    

 

With pocket size, easy carry with you when traveling whether you are a business person with a small travel bag or a backpacker looking to minimize your travel load. 1 To 3 helps you stay light with its innovative design.

 

 

1 To 3 is perfect for all your travel essentials

1 To 3 makes your travel experience easier. Much sleeker and a lot cooler-looking, 1 To 3 is hands-down the world’s smallest and the best designed travel adapter you'll ever own.

   

 

    

    

    

 

Making of 1 To 3

Aiming to create the most reliable product, we continue to test and learn from each iteration of our designs. We hope to bring our customers the best experience using this product, and realizing our concept: making 1 + 1 more than 2.

 

    

 

Prototype

 

    

 

 

 

Patent Pending Mechanical Structure

 

    

 

    

 

Comparable Chart

 

    

 

One World, One Adapter

1To3 is a compact and lightweight universal adaptor with UK, EU, AU, and US plugs. Provides travelers from US with a reliable and easy connection to the world. Thanks to built-in plugs and the universal AC output, this compact 3-sockets travel adaptor can work seamlessly in over 150 countries  from almost all over the world.   

 

   

   

   

    

    

 

Timeline

 

IF YOU WANT TO ORDER MORE THAN 10 InnoTRA 1 To 3 PLEASE CONTACT US AND WE WILL MAKE YOU A CUSTOM ORDER

story:
We’re taking ‘LIVE IT, BREATHE IT, DREAM IT’ to the next level!

G’Day. I’m Richard Kinnon, grazier and joint founder of Outback Pioneers in Longreach, Queensland. Our family tourism business is all about inspiring and educating people to experience and preserve the real Australian outback.

For more than 25 years, it has been my dream to take outback tourism experiences to the next level by creating something that honours our outback pioneers and inspires the next generations with our outback Australian heritage. 

Now, the next exciting stage of the Outback Pioneers vision is taking shape, as we work to develop a heritage precinct where our guests can live, breathe and dream the outback way of life.

Let me tell you a little more...

 

DISCOVER OUR NEW HERITAGE PRECINCT – COMING SOON

And that’s just the first stage…

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?

The outback belongs to all Australians and the pioneer stories are part of our shared history. By supporting us, you are helping preserve this heritage for future generations.

There are some great perks too of course – savings on your next year’s holiday, big discounts on Kinnon & Co leatherware atThe Station Store online, personal message from Richard Kinnon for your special occasion – and more. 

We’re also creating a very special Outback Friends Tree (embellished with copper leaves), which will be a permanent feature to recognise our supporters. You can buy a copper leaf for this tree with your name or message engraved on it and we will send you a certificate of acknowledgement. It's the perfect gift for yourself or a loved one – wherever you are in the world, you'll know a little part of you is part of us, and part of the Australian outback story,

HOW TO HELP

Get on board by supporting us in the way that best suits you. Just click the 'BACK IT' button at the top of the campaign and you can choose to contribute money or buy a perk. It's a great chance to enjoy a big saving on our special 3-day ‘Storytelling Holiday’ that shows you what it’s all about here (or experience it all over again if you’ve been before – we’d love to welcome you back!)

ALL OF THIS WILL BE WAITING FOR YOU IN 2021...

 

This is a  passion project for me and my family – my wife Marisse, and our adult children Jeremy, Lane and Abigail. It's a way for us to share the land and traditions we truly love while giving you a holiday that seems a million miles from your everyday life.

Please help us achieve the full potential of this exciting project. Simply click the 'BACK IT' button at the top of the page and you will have the choice of making a money contribution or buying perks.

Your support will also help the economy of the region, keep families on the land and preserve our inspiring outback heritage. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Whether or not you can help by contributing or enjoying our perks (every little helps, really), please help by sharing this campaign on your social media and telling friends who love Australia and the Australian outback. 

We know we have outback friends around the country and around the world and we welcome you all as part of the outback story that belongs to us all.

What people in the industry say

“The Kinnon family is committed to growing the outback economy as well as sharing outback stories, history and culture with visitors.”
Daniel Gschwind, Chief Executive, Queensland Tourism Industry Council.

“I know from Outback Pioneers previous developments, that they will execute their plans with flair and that their award-winning approach to outback cultural experiences will go from strength to strength with this project.”
Peter Homan, previously General Manager, Outback Queensland Tourism Association

“As graziers, retailers and tourism operators telling the story of pioneer times, the Kinnons have the ideal base to contribute to an understanding of the wool story in Australia.”
Mark Quartermain, Australian Wool Network

 

Perks available

Perks in more detail

Longreach Storytelling Holiday $999

This 3-day holiday is the perfect way to see all the best of Longreach at a special price and get VIP supporter treatment with a backstage pass and special gift. You could also be amongst the first to stay in our new heritage precinct pioneer accommodation.

The holiday includes:

  • 2 nights in Outback Pioneers accommodation (twin-share)
  • Nogo Station Experience
  • Starlight's Cruise Experience 
  • Cobb & Co Stagecoach Experience
  • Backstage pass to see the stagecoach horses harnessed
  • Entry to the Australian Stockman's Hall of Fame
  • Entry to Qantas Founders Museum
  • The Stonegrill Dining Experience
  • Eagle Street tour with Scotty the Barefoot Bush Poet
  • 2 full breakfasts, 1 lunch, 2 dinners, 2 smokos (morning tea)
  • VIP gift and welcome pack (worth $100)
  • Fully escorted

You can take the holiday in our April-October tourist season in 2021 or 2022. You must arrive on a Monday (accommodation Monday and Tuesday night). We recommend reserving your dates well in advance. This price is based on twin-share. A discounted single supplement of $375 applies, which we will collect when you book your dates. Once the initial phase of the Indiegogo campaign is over, we will be in touch to help you book. You can see more details of the experiences and find out how to get to Longreach on our website.

Quality Australian leatherware $500

Enjoy $650 worth of beautiful leatherware for $500. Made specially for us in Australia, the Kinnon & Co range has all the strength and charm of traditional outback leatherware and is tough enough for all your travel adventures. Choose from a large family travel bag (normally $549.95), a larger travel bag (normally $499.95) a very handy weekender bag (normally $479.95), plus a range of other leather accessories.  

Once the initial phase of the Indiegogo campaign is over, you'll get a voucher to redeem for this at The Station Store online. Make an initial leatherware purchase of at least $400 and you can have store credit for the remainder of the $650, if you choose not to use it all at once. 

Normally we ship within 5 days but we cannot deliver for Christmas this year. This is on a first-in best-dressed basis so jump in to have your order fulfilled from our current stock. If there is high demand, we will need to reorder stocks and there may be a delay of 4-6 weeks for delivery.

Personal message from Richard $120

For a birthday or special occasion, for someone who's sick or to send overseas, this personalised video greeting from Richard Kinnon (founder and owner of Outback Pioneers and a genuine outback character) is a treat for the outback lover. It'll make someone's day to hear Richard address them by their name (or nickname) with a customised message. Perhaps you could even get Richard to add some character to your marriage proposal or to invite a loved one to come and holiday in the outback with you! 

The 20-second message will be delivered via an online link. We'll contact you to get details of the recipient and the date for the message (2021  and 2022 only) once the initial phase of the Indiegogo campaign is over. 

Leaf for Outback Friends Tree $80

Be part of the creation of a unique sculpture in our pioneer heritage precinct and have your name or a loved one's name always here, caressed by the outback breezes. Treat yourself, show your appreciation for someone special, remember someone who's died or commemorate a birth or anniversary. Wherever you are in the world, you’ll know a little part of you is part of us, and part of the Australian outback story. You can have a name of up to 20 characters engraved in the artisan-crafted, copper leaf.

Once the initial phase of Indiegogo campaign is over, we'll contact you for details of the name you would like on the leaf and arrange for a certificate to confirm your personal leaf is being added to the tree. We expect the tree to be ready early in our 2021 season.

Collectable tin with bush tea $30

We'd sit down and have a cuppa with you if we could but here's the next best thing! This collectable Outback Pioneers tin is full of loose-leaf bush tea for you to brew a pot at home. Throw a few gum leaves in the pot for extra authenticity! Once the tea is gone, you still have a useful storage tin.

Price includes postage within Australia. $15 for overseas postage.

Outback Pioneers e-picture book $20

Meet the people, see the places, relish the details. Whether you've been to the outback or not, this special selection of rarely-seen photos from our collection will capture the outback pioneering spirit for you.

The 48 page digital book will be accessible via a link to your email address and comes with our thanks for your support.

 

More questions? Check the FAQs tab for more information.
story_txt:
We’re taking ‘LIVE IT, BREATHE IT, DREAM IT’ to the next level!G’Day. I’m Richard Kinnon, grazier and joint founder of Outback Pioneers in Longreach, Queensland. Our family tourism business is all about inspiring and educating people to experience and preserve the real Australian outback.For more than 25 years, it has been my dream to take outback tourism experiences to the next level by creating something that honours our outback pioneers and inspires the next generations with our outback Australian heritage. Now, the next exciting stage of the Outback Pioneers vision is taking shape, as we work to develop a heritage precinct where our guests can live, breathe and dream the outback way of life.Let me tell you a little more... DISCOVER OUR NEW HERITAGE PRECINCT – COMING SOONAnd that’s just the first stage…WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?The outback belongs to all Australians and the pioneer stories are part of our shared history. By supporting us, you are helping preserve this heritage for future generations.There are some great perks too of course – savings on your next year’s holiday, big discounts on Kinnon & Co leatherware atThe Station Store online, personal message from Richard Kinnon for your special occasion – and more. We’re also creating a very special Outback Friends Tree (embellished with copper leaves), which will be a permanent feature to recognise our supporters. You can buy a copper leaf for this tree with your name or message engraved on it and we will send you a certificate of acknowledgement. It's the perfect gift for yourself or a loved one – wherever you are in the world, you'll know a little part of you is part of us, and part of the Australian outback story,HOW TO HELPGet on board by supporting us in the way that best suits you. Just click the 'BACK IT' button at the top of the campaign and you can choose to contribute money or buy a perk. It's a great chance to enjoy a big saving on our special 3-day ‘Storytelling Holiday’ that shows you what it’s all about here (or experience it all over again if you’ve been before – we’d love to welcome you back!)ALL OF THIS WILL BE WAITING FOR YOU IN 2021... This is a  passion project for me and my family – my wife Marisse, and our adult children Jeremy, Lane and Abigail. It's a way for us to share the land and traditions we truly love while giving you a holiday that seems a million miles from your everyday life.Please help us achieve the full potential of this exciting project. Simply click the 'BACK IT' button at the top of the page and you will have the choice of making a money contribution or buying perks.Your support will also help the economy of the region, keep families on the land and preserve our inspiring outback heritage. OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPWhether or not you can help by contributing or enjoying our perks (every little helps, really), please help by sharing this campaign on your social media and telling friends who love Australia and the Australian outback. We know we have outback friends around the country and around the world and we welcome you all as part of the outback story that belongs to us all.What people in the industry say“The Kinnon family is committed to growing the outback economy as well as sharing outback stories, history and culture with visitors.”Daniel Gschwind, Chief Executive, Queensland Tourism Industry Council.“I know from Outback Pioneers previous developments, that they will execute their plans with flair and that their award-winning approach to outback cultural experiences will go from strength to strength with this project.”Peter Homan, previously General Manager, Outback Queensland Tourism Association“As graziers, retailers and tourism operators telling the story of pioneer times, the Kinnons have the ideal base to contribute to an understanding of the wool story in Australia.”Mark Quartermain, Australian Wool Network Perks availablePerks in more detailLongreach Storytelling Holiday $999This 3-day holiday is the perfect way to see all the best of Longreach at a special price and get VIP supporter treatment with a backstage pass and special gift. You could also be amongst the first to stay in our new heritage precinct pioneer accommodation.The holiday includes:
2 nights in Outback Pioneers accommodation (twin-share)
Nogo Station Experience
Starlight's Cruise Experience 
Cobb & Co Stagecoach Experience
Backstage pass to see the stagecoach horses harnessed
Entry to the Australian Stockman's Hall of Fame
Entry to Qantas Founders Museum
The Stonegrill Dining Experience
Eagle Street tour with Scotty the Barefoot Bush Poet
2 full breakfasts, 1 lunch, 2 dinners, 2 smokos (morning tea)

VIP gift and welcome pack (worth $100)

Fully escorted
You can take the holiday in our April-October tourist season in 2021 or 2022. You must arrive on a Monday (accommodation Monday and Tuesday night). We recommend reserving your dates well in advance. This price is based on twin-share. A discounted single supplement of $375 applies, which we will collect when you book your dates. Once the initial phase of the Indiegogo campaign is over, we will be in touch to help you book. You can see more details of the experiences and find out how to get to Longreach on our website. Quality Australian leatherware $500Enjoy $650 worth of beautiful leatherware for $500. Made specially for us in Australia, the Kinnon & Co range has all the strength and charm of traditional outback leatherware and is tough enough for all your travel adventures. Choose from a large family travel bag (normally $549.95), a larger travel bag (normally $499.95) a very handy weekender bag (normally $479.95), plus a range of other leather accessories.  Once the initial phase of the Indiegogo campaign is over, you'll get a voucher to redeem for this at The Station Store online. Make an initial leatherware purchase of at least $400 and you can have store credit for the remainder of the $650, if you choose not to use it all at once. Normally we ship within 5 days but we cannot deliver for Christmas this year. This is on a first-in best-dressed basis so jump in to have your order fulfilled from our current stock. If there is high demand, we will need to reorder stocks and there may be a delay of 4-6 weeks for delivery.Personal message from Richard $120For a birthday or special occasion, for someone who's sick or to send overseas, this personalised video greeting from Richard Kinnon (founder and owner of Outback Pioneers and a genuine outback character) is a treat for the outback lover. It'll make someone's day to hear Richard address them by their name (or nickname) with a customised message. Perhaps you could even get Richard to add some character to your marriage proposal or to invite a loved one to come and holiday in the outback with you! The 20-second message will be delivered via an online link. We'll contact you to get details of the recipient and the date for the message (2021  and 2022 only) once the initial phase of the Indiegogo campaign is over. Leaf for Outback Friends Tree $80Be part of the creation of a unique sculpture in our pioneer heritage precinct and have your name or a loved one's name always here, caressed by the outback breezes. Treat yourself, show your appreciation for someone special, remember someone who's died or commemorate a birth or anniversary. Wherever you are in the world, you’ll know a little part of you is part of us, and part of the Australian outback story. You can have a name of up to 20 characters engraved in the artisan-crafted, copper leaf.Once the initial phase of Indiegogo campaign is over, we'll contact you for details of the name you would like on the leaf and arrange for a certificate to confirm your personal leaf is being added to the tree. We expect the tree to be ready early in our 2021 season.Collectable tin with bush tea $30We'd sit down and have a cuppa with you if we could but here's the next best thing! This collectable Outback Pioneers tin is full of loose-leaf bush tea for you to brew a pot at home. Throw a few gum leaves in the pot for extra authenticity! Once the tea is gone, you still have a useful storage tin.Price includes postage within Australia. $15 for overseas postage.Outback Pioneers e-picture book $20Meet the people, see the places, relish the details. Whether you've been to the outback or not, this special selection of rarely-seen photos from our collection will capture the outback pioneering spirit for you.The 48 page digital book will be accessible via a link to your email address and comes with our thanks for your support. More questions? Check the FAQs tab for more information.

story:
Regatta provides an activity-based desktop and mobile app, paired with white glove concierge service to produce unforgettable luxury vacations in 50 countries in the Caribbean, Mediterranean, and Indian seas, with the largest fleet in the market:

  • 1,400+ Boats (Catamarans and Yachts)

  • 1,000+ Island Villas

  • 4,000+ Planes

  • 30+ Private Islands 

Why Luxury Vacations?

The yacht and villa charter market was valued at US$12B in 2020 and set to grow at 5.4% CAGR through 2026. The market is highly driven by the rising inclination towards personalized luxury travel. Market growth is further complemented by the increasing number of affluent high net-worth individuals (AHNW) globally; increased by nearly 8% to a record 16.5M. This represents a large and growing market, yet the technology used in the travel industry are basic inventory search databases (triggering the psychological phenomenon called, Paradox of Choice). Regatta offers an end-to-end solution: an AI-base app, the largest inventory in the market, and white-glove concierge service.

The money spent on these vacations is extraordinary with sailing catamarans chartering at $25,000 to $80,000 per week, villas renting at $15,000 to $100,000 per week, and yachts pulling in $85,000 to over $500,000 per week. It is extraordinary, but these vessels and villas sell out every year. 

Every Year over 700 million vacation days go unused in the United States alone. The equivalent of 1.9M years worth of vacation. People want to go on vacation but many just don't have the time to plan out all the little details. This is where Regatta comes in; with our technology and concierge service, our customers can create the vacation they always dreamed of (with less stress and more confidence). With our technology (Waypoint) our customers can quickly find the locations that provide the activities they desire, and the optimal villa and/or boat that enable them to enjoy those activities. Then our white-glove service guides them to/from their location and executes the perfect vacation.

Any vacation planning process is time consuming and wrought with frustrations. Tropical vacations are even harder. The selections can be frustrating with dozens of islands, each with hundreds of villas and boats, all of which look alike, and may or may not provide the activities they desire. Some locations have the activities you want to enjoy, but some don’t. The wrong island could ruin your vacation. The transportation process is complex. Not every island has an airport and today’s COVID travel restrictions make island transportation even harder.

Our solution eliminates the psychological burden referred to as the Paradox of Choice, the overwhelming feeling experienced with too many choices, often associated with travel planning. Our activity-based engine, Waypoint, allows our customers to choose the activities they want to experience, then finds the best islands, villas and/or boats to accommodate their preferences.  Waypoint then presents these choices in a fun and engaging manner. Once the user selects a vacation matching their desired activities, our concierge team confirms all logistics, prepares an itinerary, and the vacation is ready without any hassles. Just show up to the airport on time. Waypoint has all the addictive properties of dating apps, engaging the dopamine cycle that excite the customer and increase the odds of purchase.

Meet Our Founder

Our Captain is a successful entrepreneur of four start-ups, who has been a senior executive of three publicly traded companies and honored with 30 industry and 20 entrepreneurial awards, including seven INC. 500 awards. William West is making his next entrepreneurial voyage merging his passion for the sea with his love of building companies.

“Ten years ago, I took my son sailing in the Caribbean and it changed my life. I’ve gone back every year since to sail or stay in an island villa, but there’s been one consistent challenge: planning the trip. Making selections from dozens of islands, hundreds of villas and boats, arranging transportation, lodging, activities, dining, and making sure that the trip meets my original vision. After ten years and twelve islands, the planning has never gotten any easier. I formed Regatta to solve this problem and make these vacations readily accessible to the rapidly growing population of affluent, high net-worth individuals who desire them. "

"Join us - where life meets the sea, relaxation meets luxury, and where the wind will revitalize your spirit - I promise that a Regatta trip will change your life,” William

Regatta makes these truly unique and life-changing vacations readily accessible for busy, affluent families. There is nothing like experiencing life from a crisp infinity pool overlooking a sunset or peacefully riding the wind in our massive sailing and power boats. We enable our customers to share their vision, then our technology compares thousands of islands, villas/boats, and vibes until we find the perfect one for them.

Sifting through dozens of islands and hundreds of boats and villas is a wasted effort if the choices don’t provide the activities you wish to enjoy. Arrive on an island that doesn’t have beaches? Arrive to a town that doesn’t have shopping? Find yourself on a boat without scuba or fishing equipment? All these are possible, but Waypoint ensures you get to experience the tropics without heartbreak.

How Waypoint Works

Waypoint is our AI-based engine that provides the backbone to our activity-based approach to travel planning. It is radically different and makes the planning process enjoyable, simple, and highly effective.  Waypoint pulls from thousands of options to design a trip guaranteed to fulfill your dreams.

When first arriving at Waypoint, users are prompted to select the desired vacation activities they wish to experience. The user selects: the time frame, number of beds, target budget, and the activities they wish to partake in. Once you have selected your preferences, the search engine matches available yachts and villas detailing potential activities you can do. The results will detail the top 3 locations that most suit your desired activities and the optimal boat and/or villa to support your trip! They can tweak the options and compare results. From there, the user is prompted to create a consultation booking with one of our excellent concierge representatives and a custom itinerary will be created for you!

Head to www.regatta.travel to explore!

At Regatta Travel we offer the best sailing catamarans, sexy power-cats, out-of-this-world yachts, and the magnificent views and indoor-outdoor living of luxury villas. Using our unique activity-based approach to travel we get them to the places that excel in the activities they want to experience. Rather than the typical long list of vacation options, they choose the vacation experience they desire, then we identify the island destination and accommodations that meet their needs (and vibe) for a private, covid-safe, and truly unforgettable experience.

Help put wind in our sails so that we can radically change the travel industry. Help us make these life-changing getaways possible and you’ll earn discounts and free days for your own out of this world excursion!

We are seeking your help in raising $500,000 to help Regatta Travel:

  • Reinforce our marketing campaign and expand our clientele.
  • Establish the sales staff to build direct B2B relationships to attract our target audience.
  • Refine our Waypoint app to expand its AI ability and expand the database of options.
  • Improve our concierge services to include 24/7 on-call knowledgeable and high-quality representatives.
  • Develop and enhance Regatta’s operations to make booking more efficient on the back-end

Your contribution will help us get people (maybe even you!) out of their traditional vacation and into a fantasy world of yachts, villas, and even private islands easily to create memorable experiences with a loved one, family, and friends.

story:
The Uinta Daypack

 This packable daypack is brimming with your favorite features that fit in the palm of your hand. From the waterproof 25L capacity and 30D ripstop material to the anti-theft pockets and “Brain” pouch on the top, you just found your new favorite go-to pack. The minimal look hides the functional pockets, which are right where they should be in a pack. When packed down, it stays incognito so you are ready to go on your day adventures. 

Have you ever tried a packable daypack only to find that it is basically just a cheap sack of material? Or maybe you have been bringing your high quality backpack with you on all your trips and travels? The Uinta Daypack brings you a high quality feature heavy backpack in the palm of your hand!

Key Features

  • Packs Down to the Size of Your Hand
  • 30D Ripstop Material
  • Water Resistant With DWR Coating
  • 25 L Capacity
  • Anti-theft Pockets Strategically Placed Against Your Back.
  • Hydration Bladder Compatible
  • All Zippers Sealed
  • All Zippers YKK
  • Ultra Lightweight (Only 14 oz)
  • Cargo Strap For Extra Storage
  • Roll Top For Water Seal 
  • G-hook
  • Reflective Front Zippers For Visibility
  • Brain Pouch 
  • Adjustable Sternum Strap
  • DSLR Camera Quick Access

 

 25L Capacity

  The daypack fits into your pocket to be stowed away, yet it can be filled with all of your gear for a day trip. This is enough for your typical gear setup like water bottles, food, extra clothes, cameras, phone, and other everyday carry gear. 25 Liters is like 40 apples, 400 golf balls, or 6000 marbles, for those of us who measure things that way. The pockets on the outside are great for extra gear and a cargo strap for carrying large items like a jacket, tripod, or a skateboard. The main pocket also is large enough for up to 18" laptops!

 

Packable

 

The daypack packs into it's own zippered pocket so there's no stuff sack to lose! This is one of the defining characteristics of the daypack. It packs down into it's own pocket to be stowed out of the way until it is needed. It can easily fit inside any travel bag ready to be used on those days walking around Machu Picchu or exploring the Neuschwanstein castle. The pack fits into its own pocket so there is no stuff sack to lose!

 

Water Resistant    

All Zippers are Sealed, All are YKK

   The inside of the pack will keep your stuff confidently dry with a DWR coated 30D Nylon Ripstop.  Who wants to open a pack to find a wet camera or have to eat a soggy sandwich? Not us. The outside pockets also have sealed zippers, and will keep things dry from rain or water splashing. 

 

Anti-Theft

Secure pockets give you the confidence of keeping your gear protected, yet its easily accessed by only you. The main pocket is for your laptop or tablet, with a smaller pocket for your phone, passport, or wallet. This pocket gives easy access to take a quick shot, respond to a message, or pay for something. The anti-theft pockets cannot be reached by anyone without swinging the pack to your side, which allows for easy access of your valuables.

 

 Gear Access That Makes Sense  

  

The roll to lets you easily take gear in and out.

 The roll top opens wide for easy stuffing of your pack with all your gear, while the sealed side zipper allows for easy access without having to open the top again. It's the best of both worlds! 

 

Premium, Low Profile Materials

   Only the highest quality materials are used for the daypack. The main fabric is an incredibly strong 30D Nylon Ripstop, with a DWR water resistant coating. This will keep water out, scratches off, and will last a long time. Every zipper is water sealed and are the industry leading YKK with a soft grip TPU molded zipper pull. All of these have been field tested to last the test of rugged conditions.

We have also decided to change the logo to black due to popular demand!

We will be getting a mock up of what it will look like soon but in the meantime use your vivid imagination to picture the logo black (shouldn't be too hard).

 

The Straps and Adjusters

The shoulder straps on this pack are as wide as a standard backpack (2") and have a light padding to provide comfort while still being lightweight. The mesh on the underside of the shoulder straps gives a cool and lightweight feeling, while still keeping their strength from the reinforcements designed in along the sides. The shoulder straps are extra long so every body type can wear the pack comfortably.

Sternum straps should stand the test of time, that's what we believe. The sternum strap is super robust and has a light stretchy section so it is extra comfy. It can be adjusted up, down, and wide to fit every person's body type. The strap dimensions are: 18" (45cm) length padded section + 24" (60cm) adjustable nylon strap length, so the total usable strap length is 42" (107cm).

 

 Water Bladder Compatible

The Uinta Daypack has an integrated water bladder system that is perfect for hiking or those long days to always keep you hydrated. The hose routing makes sense without having to leave a zipper cracked open. There is a seperate compartment just for a hydration bladder that does not open to the main compartment. The hose can be pushed through the hole and around to the shoulder strap for quick access where you need it.

Perfect Complementary products (Designed to fit together)

 

Perfect Hydration Bladder (2L)

 This is not your typical hydration bladder. It is packed with our favorite features such as pop-proof TPU material that is seriously tough, the bladder mouth that completely opens to turn it inside out to clean it, and a quick release mechanism for the hose. It is dishwasher safe, leak-proof, and has a pop-up bite valve that lets out just the right amount of fluid when biting. All of the features are super durable and made from the highest quality materials.  

Washable!

 Have you ever made the worst mistake ever and left liquid in your old water bladder or even worse put Gatorade in it? If you are like us, you have, and you will never forget how horrible it was to clean out the bladder. We think time is better spent doing anything else in the world, so you can easily clean this bladder by turning it completely inside out and putting it in the dishwasher!

 

Compression Packing Cubes

 If you've never experienced the joy of traveling with packing cubes, prepare yourself to regret never having them before...

This set of three cubes compress down your stuff to carry the lowest possible volume. They are made with a super strong, yet lightweight 410D Nylon Ripstop and YKK zippers. The compression zipper brings the volume down by about 30% to make packing your gear efficient and dense. The cubes open all the way so they can be used right in drawers without having to unpack and repack when you are done. All these features fit into a super small package that weighs next to nothing. 

Kit Includes: 

2L Compression Cube: Perfect for electronics or small personal items.

4L Compression Cube: Just the right size for undies and Tees.

10L Compression Cube: This is the big boy that keeps all your pants, shirts, and maybe your travel companion's too!

 

Featured on:

 

When will it all ship?

Design Process

Project inspiration and development:

The project was born from a 10 day trip in Europe where I brought both a large duffel and a standard backpack, which didn't make a lot of sense to me. I wore the duffel on my back and the backpack on my front, which made me feel like a Bull in a china shop wherever I went. I could have fit all my gear into my large duffel except that my daypack didn't fit well, so I was forced to carry it outside like a dope. The problem distracted from the amazing places we visited. When I got back I looked at the available options only to find packs that were too simple, too small, or too expensive. The gears in my head started turning and I started researching to find and solve the problems found in packable daypacks available on the market.

Here I am in Zurich thinking about an easier way to do things:

Customers were surveyed, the pack was scrutinized, field tested, iterated on, and finally we captured the design with only the best features.  The included features hone in on the most important uses of a day pack, and cut out the rest. The minimal design is very functional, yet does not add unnecessary complexity that can clutter the use and ad failure points. 

 Refunds/Returns?

      We only use premium materials and offer a one year warranty. We will repair or replace any product that somehow don't hold up to do what it was designed to be used for. We do not offer refunds or returns on product that were received as a Kickstarter reward.
 

We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our products into the world. As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns.

Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do everything we can to make sure that this exchange is great for everyone involved.

Backer support is what allows us to grow and design new products. We in turn want to reward you for your support in the form of a gift. We put your funds to work and are passionate about building new and exciting products.

Thank you for your understanding and your support. If your reward for some weird reason doesn’t have value to you, you can:

1. Give your reward another chance. If the product performs differently than you were expecting, there might be a way to enhance your experience. Reach out to us and we can give you tips on how we’ve found “pro tips” and ways to make great use out of your reward. 

2. Make an excellent gift. 

3. Ebay, amazon, etc are great routes to go as the reward you received from us was sold at a discounted rate.

If you have questions reach us at hello@blancgear.com if you have any questions.
story_txt:
The Uinta Daypack This packable daypack is brimming with your favorite features that fit in the palm of your hand. From the waterproof 25L capacity and 30D ripstop material to the anti-theft pockets and “Brain” pouch on the top, you just found your new favorite go-to pack. The minimal look hides the functional pockets, which are right where they should be in a pack. When packed down, it stays incognito so you are ready to go on your day adventures. Have you ever tried a packable daypack only to find that it is basically just a cheap sack of material? Or maybe you have been bringing your high quality backpack with you on all your trips and travels? The Uinta Daypack brings you a high quality feature heavy backpack in the palm of your hand!Key Features
Packs Down to the Size of Your Hand
30D Ripstop Material
Water Resistant With DWR Coating
25 L Capacity
Anti-theft Pockets Strategically Placed Against Your Back.
Hydration Bladder Compatible
All Zippers Sealed
All Zippers YKK
Ultra Lightweight (Only 14 oz)
Cargo Strap For Extra Storage
Roll Top For Water Seal 
G-hook
Reflective Front Zippers For Visibility
Brain Pouch 
Adjustable Sternum Strap
DSLR Camera Quick Access
  25L Capacity  The daypack fits into your pocket to be stowed away, yet it can be filled with all of your gear for a day trip. This is enough for your typical gear setup like water bottles, food, extra clothes, cameras, phone, and other everyday carry gear. 25 Liters is like 40 apples, 400 golf balls, or 6000 marbles, for those of us who measure things that way. The pockets on the outside are great for extra gear and a cargo strap for carrying large items like a jacket, tripod, or a skateboard. The main pocket also is large enough for up to 18" laptops! Packable  The daypack packs into it's own zippered pocket so there's no stuff sack to lose! This is one of the defining characteristics of the daypack. It packs down into it's own pocket to be stowed out of the way until it is needed. It can easily fit inside any travel bag ready to be used on those days walking around Machu Picchu or exploring the Neuschwanstein castle. The pack fits into its own pocket so there is no stuff sack to lose! Water Resistant     Hopefully you never get rained on this much, but if you are, we've got you covered!All Zippers are Sealed, All are YKK   The inside of the pack will keep your stuff confidently dry with a DWR coated 30D Nylon Ripstop.  Who wants to open a pack to find a wet camera or have to eat a soggy sandwich? Not us. The outside pockets also have sealed zippers, and will keep things dry from rain or water splashing.  Anti-TheftKeep your gear secure where you know it can't be accessed by anyone but you.Secure pockets give you the confidence of keeping your gear protected, yet its easily accessed by only you. The main pocket is for your laptop or tablet, with a smaller pocket for your phone, passport, or wallet. This pocket gives easy access to take a quick shot, respond to a message, or pay for something. The anti-theft pockets cannot be reached by anyone without swinging the pack to your side, which allows for easy access of your valuables.
 Keep your valuables hidden and touching your back, where you can feel that they are secure.
 
Nobody has access to the pockets against your back except for you. Gear Access That Makes Sense  
  
The roll to lets you easily take gear in and out.

Quick access through the side vertical zipper (sealed).
 The roll top opens wide for easy stuffing of your pack with all your gear, while the sealed side zipper allows for easy access without having to open the top again. It's the best of both worlds!  Premium, Low Profile Materials   Only the highest quality materials are used for the daypack. The main fabric is an incredibly strong 30D Nylon Ripstop, with a DWR water resistant coating. This will keep water out, scratches off, and will last a long time. Every zipper is water sealed and are the industry leading YKK with a soft grip TPU molded zipper pull. All of these have been field tested to last the test of rugged conditions.We have also decided to change the logo to black due to popular demand!We will be getting a mock up of what it will look like soon but in the meantime use your vivid imagination to picture the logo black (shouldn't be too hard). The Straps and AdjustersThe shoulder straps on this pack are as wide as a standard backpack (2") and have a light padding to provide comfort while still being lightweight. The mesh on the underside of the shoulder straps gives a cool and lightweight feeling, while still keeping their strength from the reinforcements designed in along the sides. The shoulder straps are extra long so every body type can wear the pack comfortably.Shoulder Strap (Left) has a soft mesh on the outside with padding on the inside. Sternum strap (right) can adjust up and down and open wider.Sternum straps should stand the test of time, that's what we believe. The sternum strap is super robust and has a light stretchy section so it is extra comfy. It can be adjusted up, down, and wide to fit every person's body type. The strap dimensions are: 18" (45cm) length padded section + 24" (60cm) adjustable nylon strap length, so the total usable strap length is 42" (107cm).  Water Bladder Compatible
The Uinta Daypack has an integrated water bladder system that is perfect for hiking or those long days to always keep you hydrated. The hose routing makes sense without having to leave a zipper cracked open. There is a seperate compartment just for a hydration bladder that does not open to the main compartment. The hose can be pushed through the hole and around to the shoulder strap for quick access where you need it.Most 2L Hydration packs will fit into the custom designed pocket.
 Perfect Complementary products (Designed to fit together) Perfect Hydration Bladder (2L) This is not your typical hydration bladder. It is packed with our favorite features such as pop-proof TPU material that is seriously tough, the bladder mouth that completely opens to turn it inside out to clean it, and a quick release mechanism for the hose. It is dishwasher safe, leak-proof, and has a pop-up bite valve that lets out just the right amount of fluid when biting. All of the features are super durable and made from the highest quality materials.      Would you do this to your old blue hydration pack? Didn't think so. This one can take the abuse.Washable!Turn it inside out and throw it in the dishwasher! Have you ever made the worst mistake ever and left liquid in your old water bladder or even worse put Gatorade in it? If you are like us, you have, and you will never forget how horrible it was to clean out the bladder. We think time is better spent doing anything else in the world, so you can easily clean this bladder by turning it completely inside out and putting it in the dishwasher! Compression Packing Cubes Compress these indestructible cubes down by 30%. If you've never experienced the joy of traveling with packing cubes, prepare yourself to regret never having them before...This set of three cubes compress down your stuff to carry the lowest possible volume. They are made with a super strong, yet lightweight 410D Nylon Ripstop and YKK zippers. The compression zipper brings the volume down by about 30% to make packing your gear efficient and dense. The cubes open all the way so they can be used right in drawers without having to unpack and repack when you are done. All these features fit into a super small package that weighs next to nothing. This is what the kit includesKit Includes: 2L Compression Cube: Perfect for electronics or small personal items.4L Compression Cube: Just the right size for undies and Tees.10L Compression Cube: This is the big boy that keeps all your pants, shirts, and maybe your travel companion's too! Featured on: When will it all ship?Design ProcessProject inspiration and development:The project was born from a 10 day trip in Europe where I brought both a large duffel and a standard backpack, which didn't make a lot of sense to me. I wore the duffel on my back and the backpack on my front, which made me feel like a Bull in a china shop wherever I went. I could have fit all my gear into my large duffel except that my daypack didn't fit well, so I was forced to carry it outside like a dope. The problem distracted from the amazing places we visited. When I got back I looked at the available options only to find packs that were too simple, too small, or too expensive. The gears in my head started turning and I started researching to find and solve the problems found in packable daypacks available on the market.Here I am in Zurich thinking about an easier way to do things:Walking around like this even for a little while is frustrating and makes you vulnerable to pickpocketers.
 Customers were surveyed, the pack was scrutinized, field tested, iterated on, and finally we captured the design with only the best features.  The included features hone in on the most important uses of a day pack, and cut out the rest. The minimal design is very functional, yet does not add unnecessary complexity that can clutter the use and ad failure points. Early survey data, Sketches, and first prototype iterations. Refunds/Returns?      We only use premium materials and offer a one year warranty. We will repair or replace any product that somehow don't hold up to do what it was designed to be used for. We do not offer refunds or returns on product that were received as a Kickstarter reward. We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our products into the world. As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns.Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do everything we can to make sure that this exchange is great for everyone involved.Backer support is what allows us to grow and design new products. We in turn want to reward you for your support in the form of a gift. We put your funds to work and are passionate about building new and exciting products.Thank you for your understanding and your support. If your reward for some weird reason doesn’t have value to you, you can:1. Give your reward another chance. If the product performs differently than you were expecting, there might be a way to enhance your experience. Reach out to us and we can give you tips on how we’ve found “pro tips” and ways to make great use out of your reward. 2. Make an excellent gift. 3. Ebay, amazon, etc are great routes to go as the reward you received from us was sold at a discounted rate.If you have questions reach us at hello@blancgear.com if you have any questions.

story:
About Snowflake

We created Snowflake last winter after realizing there wasn't an easy way for like-minded people to connect and go on outdoor adventures - yes, you could go on Tinder, Bumble or one of the other several social apps out there, but they're not the most ideal apps for finding someone to go skiing or hiking with. In a given year, 30% of skiers and riders won't go shredding because they simply "don't have anyone to go with." Here at Snowflake, we're all very passionate about skiing, riding, hiking and other outdoorsy sports - there's truly nothing more fulfilling than being in the mountains, especially with friends! 

Sometimes a friend isn't up for going riding one Saturday though or perhaps you want to go on an impromptu trip to Park City, Utah one weekend and want to find someone to ski or ride with. Snowflake is the community we've all been longing for - a community of adventurers that want to spend time outdoors or simply grab a drink after a long day of shredding! We're currently just allowing users to choose skiing and snowboarding for sports they're interested in, but we will be adding hiking, mountain biking, and other outdoor sports this spring! 

How it works

Snowflake is integrated with Facebook so it's super easy to create a profile, upload a few photos, answer a few questions about your ability level and mountains preferences and input your home mountain.

 

Once you've created a profile, you'll see everyone in your surrounding area (based on radius) their ability level, mountain preferences and where they want to improve. You will be able to match with users in your area by simply pressing the "Let's Shred" button - if they match with you, you can message and you'll be taking runs together in no time! 

 

The Snowflake team has learned a tremendous amount from last winter and based on user feedback throughout the season, the new iOS version and Andriod version launching for the upcoming season will include a better design, improved user experience, and new features!

NEW FEATURES 

The group shred feature allows users to create groups of people to shred together on a specific day! Rather than just meeting up with one person, you can create a group of snow buddies to shred with or get drinks with at a local après ski bar! Perhaps, a few people from Boston carpool together to Loon Mountain after connecting through the group shred feature - the opportunities are endless! You'll be able to see group shred events in your area, or in a future area (perhaps you're heading to Jackson Hole for vacation!) and if any matches are attending - you'll truly never have to shred alone if you don't want to! You can also input the exact dates you're heading to certain mountains so it's that much easier to coordinate with people about when you want to shred. 

We will be unveiling awesome giveaways, more restaurant deals, happy hour deals, après ski events, and many more with an improved events/deals feature! 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP 

With winter just around the corner, it's the perfect time to get involved with Snowflake especially with all of the new changes occurring! One of Snowflake's co-founders, Catherine developed a passion for programming while running Snowflake last winter in Breckenridge, CO. This past summer, she attended a 3-month web development course at DevMountain, a top coding boot camp in the country. She learned a significant amount about coding but does not have the expertise to build the Android version completely by herself without a senior developer. She is contributing to the code but we have hired a more experience Android developer - app development is not cheap and we will also be revamping the iOS app as well with those new features.

We will use any remaining funds on marketing Snowflake to expand our markets and create a community of thousands of people around the US, Canada, and parts of Europe! 

Risks & Challenges

There are several components that go into app development - it's no easy feat, but with Catherine's recent education and experience creating a few website apps, we're confident that iOS and Android app development will go smoothly. 

Lastly, we want to thank all of our Kickstarter supporters from last year (it didn't reach it's goal), our investors, and everyone that downloaded and used Snowflake in its infancy. We're super psyched to revamp Snowflake, to create a larger world-wide community of outdoor adventurers, to butter on powder with fellow Snowflakers, and have an incredible ski season - we hope that you will help us achieve this!

story:
Greetings all!

The coaches and parents of the gresham park are reaching out to family and friends to help raise funds for the  10 and under gresham park orioles baseball team. This is our second year with the team and we are continuing to make strides with their development. We are focusing on using baseball to teach the children the important aspects of life in general. We teach the children hard work, dedication, commitment and many other characteristics that will carry on into their everyday lives. By you all contributing you will make sure that we have all the necessary tools to make our season a success. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $2,000.00 for the season. This will help us get all the necessary equipment and tools to contribute to their growth and development on and off the baseball field. We need:

Helmets, Baseballs, uniforms,  baseball bags, batting tees, hit sticks, bats and also money for travel and tournament fees. We plan to give many rewards out from the team to you personally as contributors as a sign of our appreciation. If we don't meet our goal we will try and to distribute them evenly so we can still get some of the items needed for the season.

The Impact

The parents and coaches believe in keeping our children busy. We have so many situations when we see young men getting in trouble in the streets because they have nothing else to do. We put our children in environments that are safe in which they can flourish and just be kids!!!! The goal is to have any one of these kids that want to play baseball in college to give them the skills to do so. The skills we provide them can hopefully get them scholarships to help their educational goals as well.

Risks & Challenges

Last season for the ORIOLES was a bumpy one for both kids and parents. We literally started off not being able to play catch, to beating a 10 year old playoff team!!! (we were mostly nine at the time) The template for a great season has been already made We just need your support.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know everyone can't contribute but you can help by spreading the word on this campaign. Please use facebook, word of mouth, email and the indiegogo share tools!

story:
-Brandon a.k.a. Mystic7 reviews GO Backpack first 1.5 minutes

 

-Nick @ Trainer Tips reviews GO Backpack first 5 minutes

 

-Dronpes @ The Silph Road
 
 

The GO Backpack is a smart and flexible backpack designed around the everyday workflow of Pokémon trainers. From exercising at the gym, to running for classes, to meeting with coworkers or sprinting for that Tyranitar, it is the one backpack for all the situations.

 

 

 

I'm 5'8"

 

Four key features for Pokémon* trainers –

1. Organizer pockets for multiple batteries. Inside the back panel. It is the best spot for weight distribution.

2. Insulation pockets on both sides. Bring your own bottle to avoid paying extra for hydration. And keep your water bottles cool. 

3. The perfect exit spots for charging cable. Two exit points for left handed play and right handed play.

4. Secret wallet pocket located on your lower back. Sprint or walk, you can feel confident that your wallet is safe and secure.

 

It’s more than a backpack for Pokémon Go*, it’s your everyday carry workhorse. Every feature had been meticulously evaluated and engineered to give you maximum value for your money. In Pokemon Go* speak, the IV of this pack is off the charts high! 

For Work

For School

For Gym - There's walking, and then there's working out

 

For Vacation - Nom.Nom.Nom your way to the next adventure

 

For Baby - Too... Much... Diapers...

 

 

Big Bottom Pocket - bring your training shoes to the gym

Big Bottom Pocket - can also be dirty laundry pocket when you travel

Padded Laptop Pocket - 360 degrees padded laptop compartment

Padded Slip Pocket - lined with fleece to protect screen

Zipper Pocket - for small loose items

Flap Pocket - for larger loose items

Stretch Side Pockets - for cables / power cords

Headset Holder - plus a dedicated spot for cord management

 

  • Front / back / side reflective details for night visibility

  • Curved shoulder strap design for better ergonomics around your chest and shoulders

  • Webbing connection on shoulder straps for narrow and wide shoulders

  • Padded top carry handle

  • Universal side carry handles, for both left handed and right handed carry

  • Trolley slip through to sit on rolling luggage

 

Like everybody during summer of 2016, I was caught up with the Pokémon Go* craze. Being in NYC, like every Pokémon Go* player, I made the sprint from Grand Army Plaza to Bryant Park to catch that Dragonite. Although the Dragonite ran away, it was an exhilarating experience to physically chase down a rare Pokémon*.

Then I started sketching.

 

Early August was when I received my very first prototype. What best way to test this backpack than a 20-Hours Pokemon Go* marathon session? I got into my trainer gear, took the LIRR into the city and started walking.

Disclaimer 

* "Pokemon", "Pokemon Go", are registered trademarks of Nintendo of America Inc. and Nintendo Co., Ltd. or their affiliates.

We are not affiliated with these companies.

Risks and challenges

Our team has first-hand experience with product development and manufacturing.

We had been working with a factory that went through multiple rounds of sampling to refine the details, feature set and production optimization of the GO Backpack.

They are well prepared for production when the project is fully funded.

We are also working with our fulfillment partners to best deliver the GO Backpack to your hand as smoothly and as quickly as possible.

With that said, there are inherent risks of delay during the production (accidents) and fulfillment process (customs inspections) that may be beyond our control. We will keep our backers updated throughout the campaign and manufacturing phase to ensure that we stay ahead of the proposed delivery schedule.

Whatever happens, your happiness is our utmost priority. We will do everything we can to deliver this product with all its promises.

We had been working with a factory that went through multiple rounds of sampling to refine the details, feature set and production optimization of the GO Backpack.
They are well prepared for production when the project is fully funded.
We are also working with our fulfillment partners to best deliver the GO Backpack to your hand as smoothly and as quickly as possible.
With that said, there are inherent risks of delay during the production (accidents) and fulfillment process (customs inspections) that may be beyond our control. We will keep our backers updated throughout the campaign and manufacturing phase to ensure that we stay ahead of the proposed delivery schedule.
Whatever happens, your happiness is our utmost priority. We will do everything we can to deliver this product with all its promises.

story:
Adventure is everywhere! 

Hi! I'm Monica Ortega and I am the creator and host of Monica Goes. I want to show people that you don't have to be an adrenaline junkie, an expert, or a rich world-traveler to take an adventure and change your life. From national parks, to big cities, to going off the beaten path, adventure truly is everywhere. 

I have been a professional host, actress, singer, line dancer, and occasional bull-rider for the past 13 years and trying new things and pushing out of my comfort zone made me want to encourage other people to do the same. I don't want to just SHOW you the different adventures that I'm on, I want to take you along, give you the information you need to go, and inspire you to take the leap and do it yourself!

In the past two years I've created over 35 episodes, written 90 blogs, started an #adventurechat on Twitter, built up a following of over 35,000 people, and created relationships with many different companies. It's right at that next step! I'm in the process of securing sponsorships and pitching the sizzle reel to networks but I need your help. I research, shoot, host, edit, and promote the show entirely on my own and have done it all out of pocket for the last two years. With one more year of funding, I can get the show to a place where it is either on a network educating people on tv, or a self-sustaining webseries that continues to grow and inspire. 

I am looking to raise $30,000 to fund Monica Goes and get it to a place where it is making enough money on its own. This money will go toward travel costs and camera equipment as well as networking events and conferences. I am always learning and trying to improve. Last year I attended a 3-day entrepreneur workshop, the Women in Travel Summit, the LA Travel and Adventure Show and became a member of the Superstar blogging e-course. Also, because I create the entire show on my own, the funding would go towards having an assistant to help me shoot the episodes and work with potential sponsors. 

In 2017 I have already traveled to Pismo Beach and Kings Canyon National Park. I have trips planned to Iceland and Colorado and am hoping to add Alaska, Michigan, the Grand Canyon, Arizona, and Portland to the list. This money will help make these episodes a reality.

I also feel very strongly about giving back! I want this to be a show for everyone and I love our National Parks and want to encourage people to explore them for years to come. So for every donation the show receives I will donate $1 to the National Park Service. 

Here are some more perks to donating!

  • $25 donations receive a Monica Goes pen and personalized thank you message
  • $50 donations will receive a pen and Monica Goes sticky pad as well as a thank you
  • $100 donations will get an adventure bumper sticker, the pen, sticky pad, and a thank you!
  • $1000 donations will receive everything above as well as a producer credit

Every little bit helps! If the goal is not reached, I plan to take whatever is raised and put it toward advancing this show. I believe wholeheartedly in creating something inspiring and will continue to do that in whatever way I can. Even if you cannot contribute you can still be a part of this goal by sharing this campaign with others through email, social media, and even word of mouth. Chances are you know someone who loves the outdoors and travel and might be looking for something exactly like this. Thank you in advance for all of your help and encouragement!
