story:
Hello everyone, my name is Bart, I'm 27 and I'm becoming a father in July. I was born in Poland, although in my opinion, the whole Earth is our homeland, if we're wise enough to cooperate with it.
I've always loved traveling. Whether it be by plane, train, or automobile. However most of my trips were wild, extreme and really dangerous. In my life, I found myself in more than a few difficult situations.

I've never felt that I'm 100% prepared with standard survival kits to face out difficulties during my adventures.

STRAPZ came out of need to feel safe and be prepared, whether it is a short tour or a long, exhausting expedition.
I wanted to create timeless and extra durable piece to fulfil your survival needs, an accessory that you can bring with you to the city, on hikes, and on all of your adventures. 

Women, as well as men, can use STRAPZ.

I always wanted to become a paramedic, but I've chosen to study National Defence. My mission is to give you the right tools, to deal with sudden accidents during your trips. I want you to come home safe and sound from your every journey.

I would like to make sure, that you or your family will be always prepared for difficulties caused by unexpected things.

There is no team of "experts" with me, as can you usually notice on other projects.  As my mission and goals are clear, I don't really need a bunch of folks messing around (no offense). I know what I'm doing and I know how to deliver the best product quality to customers.

STRAPZ has the strongest stitches on the market!

One of the people, who tested STRAPZ (an ex-army officer) said to me "It's just a couple of straps and other accesories, but it works perfectly and most importantly - it gives the ability to save lives...pitty you weren't born earlier Bart.."

 “The greatest ideas are the simplest.” William Golding

STRAPZ is made of thick and extremely durable polypropylene webbing, breaking strength of:

  • RED -  3858lb;1750kg,
  • BLACK - 2204lb;1050kg
  • GREEN - 1543lb;700kg

This material is waterproof, UV resistant and floatable (melting point 300°F).

I invented STRAPZ to benefit people in 3 ways: FIRST AID, SURVIVAL and OUTDOOR EXERCISES. 

It completes and works with every survival gear. However it's a great survival kit itself!

STRAPZ is fully invented, designed and manufactured by myself. I put my best effort in the whole process of production. 

 

All components of STRAPZ:

 

  1. Green harness - comfortable (shoulder strap pads included) & fully adjustable, features emergency whistle, fire starter, pill/tinder container, paracord (16ft - 5m) and 3 x carabiner.
  2. Red bands - the most durable straps. You will find them useful to fasten firewood, huge objects such as logs, trees, etc. They work great as arm sling, ankle stabilizer or improvised traction splint.
  3. Black handles - the most durable handles in the world, help you to carry unstable items. Also perfect for outdoor workouts.
  4. Green band/tourniquet - provides an effective mean to stop 'catastrophic haemorrhage' - serious bleeding wounds to the extent that death is imminent due to blood loss. Green band can also be used as a bedroll strap.
  5. Black tow strap - connected to the harness allows you to literally tow heavy objects or injured companions (on improvised stretcher). Black strap works well as sling shot .
  6. Green bottle/can holder - heavy duty & water resistant. Keep your hands free during your outing and have your water or favorite drink at you side (if you find yourself in a difficult situation without any bottle or can, you may always use a plastic bag filled with water).

All weigh just 1.94lb(880g)!

STRAPZ fits into small and waterproof bag, which can be used as a floatation device.

Screw lock carabiners are much safer than normal ones.

Right shoulder strap features an integrated emergency whistle, fire starter and a paracord (16ft - 5m).

 

5 colors to chose:

 

Uses of paracord are limitless!

6 example uses of paracord:

 

When noone's around and you're stranded in the middle of nowhere...With STRAPZ, there's always an option to survive!

Example uses of STRAPZ:

Improvised traction splint

 

Outdoor workouts

Carrying a firewood

Dragging a log

 

STRAPZ is entirely integrated with backpacks and survival packs

 

My goal is to build a company and create products that give the people confidence on every trip. STRAPZ is just the begining, I have more innovative ideas inside my head.

For this campaign I would like to raise $10k, however more funds = more upgrades = more benefits for contributors.

The funding will be used to get the manufacturing process working in an efficient and streamlined way, ready for mass production.

If you can't help financially, don't worry! You can still help by spreading the word! Share, Tweet, Like and talk about STRAPZ with all your friends. Share the IndieGoGo link with everyone and help me build momentum.

 

1.  Double fronted beanie cap: You can wear both sides interchangeably, back with Wildman logo and front your name.

2.  Shipping Addresses: Before I ship anything I’ll be emailing & asking you to confirm your address, so please don’t worry if you've moved since you ordered.

3.  Paracord Color: If none of the colors above matches your taste, just simply get in touch with me: hello@wildman-survival.pl and I'll try to solve the problem.

4.  Size: STRAPZ is completely adjustable to fit anyone (also available in kids sizes if required).

5.  STRAPZ GIFs: If you just want to contribute without receiving any GIFs, post a comment or send an e-mail: hello@wildman-survival.pl.

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to post a comment or contact me: hello@wildman-survival.pl.

story:
Historic Log Cabin Renovation

Hi, I am Nancy Page.  I am the owner of Wakaigan Shores LLC.  We are a small, family run resort on Houghton Lake in Michigan.  We have nine log cabins that were built in the early 1950's.  I took ownership of this resort in 2012 and my family and I have been working very hard to restore the quality of this establishment.  We are currently running at 90% occupancy rate during the summer season and have mostly repeat business each year.  Our goal is to be the premium family resort in Michigan and to bring back the wholesome family vacation that was very popular  in the 'good old days'.

Since we took ownership we have been working very hard to renovate the log cabins.  We have been roofing cabins, replacing rotted logs, chinking, and a variety of other tasks that are required by these special structures. " Morning Mist" (aka Cabin 4), has some special problems.  Her walls have pulled apart which has led to a sagging roof.  In addition, she needs some foundation work and approximately 15 logs replaced.  Once this is done, she will also need a new roof.  My husband and I try as best we can to make the repairs ourselves, but straightening walls and log replacement is a bit beyond our skill level.  We do have an excellent Michigan craftsman that helps us with these tasks and has provided us with a plan to save this lovely cabin. However, in this case, time is critical as the more winters pass, the more difficult it becomes to save this great cabin.  We want to have this work completed by the summer 2016 season, so the families who stay in "Morning Mist" will be able to enjoy our efforts.

We are looking to raise $4000, which should be sufficient to repair the logs and walls.  It should also cover the chinking material (we do this work ourselves).  Any additional funds will go to cover roofing material and to help repair our other eight log cabins.  We have replaced roofs on two cabins and have completed log repair on four cabins, but there is still a lot of work to do.  Log cabins are a labor of love!

We appreciate all donations, regardless of size.  We have offered "perks" for larger donations, but every dollar is meaningful.  And whether you can donate or not, you can help our cause by sharing our campaign in email and on facebook, so please tell your friends.  

Thank you so much from me and my family at Wakaigan Shores Resort!

story:
MOMO, Not only a Robot, But also a Friend  :)

Have you ever worked alone till late at night, feeling tired, sleepy and lonely?

Are you always obsessed in computer without even having a rest?

Do you think there's not enough realistic interaction but too much in virtual?

Don't worry, here comes the MOMO!

MOMO is your desktop friend designed to accompany you and remind you in order to solve the above problems you may have encountered.


Why MOMO?

Though sitting for a long time is a universally-known unhealthy habit, we usually find it hard to stop working with the computer without a reminder.

There are existing apps and alarms indeed, however, they are always easy to shut down and don't have interaction with humans . A cute and friendly reminder from reality gives you love and care. That’s why we design MOMO.

Get your own MOMO to have a healthier and efficient work style!


What have MoMo Achieved Now ?

Basic Functions

MOMO is a cute desktop reminder robot that can help you build up healthy and orderly working habit. It has an ultrasonic module and a human infrared sensor module to receive information from the environment and it will properly remind the user based on the information.

If you have been sticking to the PC for 52 minutes, it will nod his head and remind you to take a break for about 17 minutes, as the 52-17 pattern is considered to be the healthiest and the most efficient way of working.

If you ignore his behavior and go on working, it will get irritated, nodding heavier and quicker for it realizes "my master didn't listen to me".

Simple, cute and friendly, MOMO is the tiny hero standing on your table, always taking care of your health and accompanying you.


The Features!

Robot toy(easy,safe,fun)


We are inspired by wooden puzzle. The structure is not only solid and artistic but also make assembly process full of fun. You will get a sense of accomplishment by making up a MOMO on your own!


Personalized shell(color,shape) 

you can DIY to change the face, the color or even the shape of your MOMO freely! It's a simple but pleasant work with numbers of choices far beyond your imagination! We also provide various shells for you to make up your MOMO!


What more can MOMO Achieve with Your Support?

Since the MOMO is currently still not perfect in both Kernel and Shell, we extremely need your support to help us carry on our process to develop it. Your contribution will help to improve MOMO a lot in terms of the following aspects:

Kernel

1. Using better sensors to get more accurate data

2. Make it completely encapsulated so that it can change the shells freely or just make the electrical components easy enough to be assembled by anybody.

3. Build an app to make its function more diversified and privatized.

4. Build up MOMO’s datacloud technology module to record your working habit and provide personalized suggestions


Shell

1. More choices on pattern and shape

2. Offer customized services

3. Open up DIY Studio worldwide

Only with your support, we can bring the complete cute MOMO to you!


Pick your perks!



Perk Shipping fee

-Postcard sending for free

-Sending MOMOs 8 USD worldwide


What We Need & What You Get

30000 USD Is the level 1 goal of us


What can we do with 30000 USD: 

• To find small factories to produce MOMO for us

• To make the structure stronger and the kernel safer for better user experience

• To cover the cost of material, lacer, package, hiring people and the shipping (Totally 27000~28000USD for about 700 MOMO normal version)

• To pay for some advertisements online and sundry (About1000~2000USD)

 What can you get as(if) we achieve our level 1 goal

 A Key buckle being particularly designed will be delivered with your MOMO!

(This service is only provided to those who donate more than 5 USD for the cost of international shipping fare)


80000 USD is the level 2 goal of us



What can we do with 80000 USD

• To find professional manufacturer to produce MOMO for us

• To use better sensors in MOMO for more accurate data and make the electrical components completely encapsulated so that it can change the shells freely or just make the electrical components easy enough to assemble by anybody

• To build an app to make its function Diversified and privatized

• More choices on pattern and shape

 What can you get If achieve our level 2 goal

A little MOMO doll will be delivered with your MOMO!

 (This service is only provided to those who donate more than 5 USD for the cost of international shipping fare)


150000 USD is the final goal of us


What can we do with 150000 USD

• To produce the best MOMO by ourselves

• To build up MOMO’s data cloud technology module to record your working habit and provided personalized suggestions

• To provide customized service

• To open up DIY Studio worldwide

• Free shipping worldwide

What can you get as we achieved our final goal

A free pro shell will be delivered with your MOMO!

(For those who already have a pro shell in your perk, we'll give you a different one)

(This service is only provided to those who donate more than 5 USD for the cost of international shipping fare)

All your money will be given back if we failed to raise enough money as we expected.


Time line



Who is the MoMo team?

Co-funder

Consultant

Risks & Challenges


FAQ

Battery

       How do I charge MOMO? 

        MOMO uses the USB power supply and works with 5V.


Network

        Do I need a Wi-Fi network?

         Not necessarily. MOMO can work without Wi-Fi. And MOMO can upload user’s data or set by user when it is connected to Wi-Fi.

        Which wireless networks will support M0M0?

         MOMO can connect via both Bluetooth and Wi-Fi.


App

        Where will I be able to download MOMO app?

         You will able to purchase it from our website, as it will become available.

        Does MOMO app work with iOS and Android mobile devices?

         Yes. MOM0 will have its own mobile app and can be downloaded for free on any smartphone that is compatible with iOS and Android.

        Can I set up MOMO with several smartphones or computer?

         Several phones, tablets or computers can set up the same MoMo. Your MoMo will notify you if someone else is already actively using it, but there is only one device can set up M0MO at the same time.


Equipment

        What colors is available for MOMO?

          We have designed a national flag series. There are plans to design more series of Minecraft, super heroes and so on. Also we will provide DIY services/ customizing services.

          Can someone else set up my M0M0?

          To remotely set up your MOMO, you must log in with a unique and secure username and password. You can share your MOMO to others and they can set up your MoMo by accepting your authorization.


Contact

        If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

         Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible!

         For all questions, you can contact us at momo_robot@163.com.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are alternative ways to offer help other than supporting us financially, including but not limited to :

1) helping us to do the online promotion through SNS. We do need the help because of the risks and challenges. 

2)providing us with your own idea about MoMo. Once the idea is adopted, we will deliver a MoMo to you for free.

minutes, as the 52-17 pattern is considered to be the healthiest and the most efficient
way of working.







If you ignore his behavior and go on working, it will get irritated, nodding heavier and
quicker for it realizes "my master didn't listen to me".




Simple, cute and friendly, MOMO is the tiny hero standing on your table, always taking care of your health and
accompanying you.







The Features!

Robot toy(easy,safe,fun)




We are inspired by wooden
puzzle. The structure is not only solid and artistic but also make
assembly process full of fun. You will get a sense of accomplishment by making up a MOMO on your own!


Personalized shell(color,shape)  


you can DIY to change the face,
the color or even the shape of your MOMO freely! It's a simple but pleasant
work with numbers of choices far beyond your imagination! We also provide various shells for
you to make up your MOMO!


What more can MOMO Achieve with Your Support?
Since the MOMO is currently still not perfect
in both Kernel and Shell, we extremely need your support to help us carry on
our process to develop it. Your contribution will help to improve MOMO a lot in terms of the following aspects:

Kernel
1. Using better sensors to get more accurate data

2. Make it completely encapsulated so that it can change the shells freely or just make the electrical components easy enough to be assembled by anybody.

3. Build an app to make its function more diversified and
privatized. 
4. Build up MOMO’s datacloud technology module to record your working habit and provide
personalized suggestions

Shell



1. More choices on pattern and shape
2. Offer customized services
3. Open up DIY Studio worldwide
Only with your support, we can
bring the complete cute MOMO to you! 




Pick your perks!












Perk
Shipping fee

-Postcard sending for free
-Sending MOMOs 8 USD worldwide



What We Need & What You Get


 



30000 USD Is the level 1 goal of us





What can we do with 30000 USD: 
• To find small factories to produce MOMO for us
• To make the structure stronger and the kernel safer for better
user experience
• To cover the cost of material, lacer, package, hiring people and
the shipping (Totally 27000~28000USD for about 700 MOMO normal version)
• To pay for some advertisements online and sundry (About1000~2000USD)
 What can you get as(if) we
achieve our level 1 goal A Key buckle being particularly designed will be
delivered with your MOMO!

(This service is only provided to those who donate more than 5 USD for the cost of international shipping fare)


80000 USD is the level 2 goal of us






What can we do with 80000 USD
• To find professional manufacturer to produce MOMO for us
• To use better sensors in MOMO for more accurate data and make the electrical components completely
encapsulated so that it can change the shells freely or just make the
electrical components easy enough to assemble by anybody
• To build an app to make its function Diversified and
privatized
• More choices on pattern and shape
 What can you get If achieve
our level 2 goal

A little MOMO doll will be delivered with your MOMO! (This service is only provided to those who donate more than 5 USD for the cost of international shipping fare)

150000 USD is the final goal of us




What can we do with 150000 USD
• To produce the best MOMO by ourselves
• To build up MOMO’s data cloud technology module to record
your working habit and provided personalized suggestions
• To provide customized service
• To open up DIY Studio worldwide
• Free shipping worldwide
What can you get as we
achieved our final goal
A free pro shell will be delivered with your MOMO!
(For those who already have a pro shell in your perk,
we'll give you a different one)
(This service is only provided to those who donate more than 5 USD for the cost of international shipping fare)
All your money will be given back if we failed to raise enough money as we expected.


Time
line





Who is
the MoMo team?

Co-funder


Consultant







Risks & Challenges






FAQ
Battery
       How do I charge MOMO?  
        MOMO uses the USB power supply and works with 5V.

Network
        Do I need a Wi-Fi network?
         Not
necessarily. MOMO can work without Wi-Fi. And MOMO can upload user’s
data or set by user when it is connected to Wi-Fi.
        Which wireless networks will support
M0M0?
         MOMO can connect via both Bluetooth and Wi-Fi.


App
        Where will I be able to
download MOMO app?
         You
will able to purchase it from our website, as it will become available.
        Does MOMO app work with iOS and
Android mobile devices?
         Yes. MOM0 will
have its own mobile app and can be downloaded for free on any smartphone that
is compatible with iOS and Android.
        Can I set up MOMO with
several smartphones or computer?
         Several
phones, tablets or computers can set up the same MoMo. Your MoMo will notify
you if someone else is already actively using it, but there is only one
device can set up M0MO at the same time.


Equipment
        What colors is available for MOMO?
          We have
designed a national flag series. There are plans to design more series of
Minecraft, super heroes and so on. Also we will provide DIY services/
customizing services.
          Can someone else set up my M0M0?
          To remotely set up your MOMO,
you must log in with a unique and secure username and password. You can share
your MOMO to others and they can set up your MoMo by accepting your
authorization.

Contact
        If
I have questions, how can I reach your team?
         Please
read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of
special requests, and are responding as fast as possible!
         For
all questions, you can contact us at momo_robot@163.com.

Other Ways You Can Help
There are alternative ways to offer help other than supporting us financially, including but not limited to :
1) helping us to do the online promotion through SNS. We do need the help
because of the risks and challenges. 
2)providing us with your own idea
about MoMo. Once the idea is adopted, we will deliver a MoMo
to you for free.

story:
FishLook

The World’s first Social Fishing Network! Watch the video here:  http://goo.gl/KXtUzQ

Short Summary

Your favourite sport just got more Fun and Interactive !

As a keen angler and someone passionate about technology – I have long thought that there should be a place, other than FaceBook for sharing news of your successful catch with like-minded anglers.  It would be completely AMAZING to develop an app FOR Anglers – designed and made by Anglers!

What We Need & What You Get

The estimated cost to develop the app is £1000.  I will be paying specialist developers to help write the code, and already graphic designers have mocked up the Graphical user interface. Check them out. After that the developers will bring FishLook to life for your smartphone.

There are three levels of contribution.

Platinum Angler Supporter £7

ACCESS to the Beta versions of the App - through the development  - INPUT to the developers with your ideas  - MONTHLY updates by e-mail - FINAL version of the FishLook app FREE.

Gold Angler Supporter  @ £5 

INPUT to the developers with your ideas  - MONTHLY updates by e-mail - FINAL version of the FishLook app FREE.

Silver Angler Supporter @ £2

MONTHLY updates by e-mail - FINAL version of the FishLook app FREE.

If I don’t get to the goal – then the funds will be donated to a good charity http://www.fishingforheroes.com/ and that’s where it will end, so your money will still go to a good cause, but I am hoping you would still rather have the app !

The Impact

Your contribution will make a difference – because without it this project will not start.

UK Anglers and the wider fishing community will love FishLook on their smartphone, by the side of the river or the lake. It brings a whole new dimension to the fishing experience.  Take a look at what FishLook will do:

Share Your success:   Just caught a fish?  – Take the glory shot on your phone and share it in seconds

Share Your moment:  Other anglers are interested to know what bait you used and any special methods to land your catch.

Share Your Location:  Where and when did you make that catch?  Your smartphone allows you to share a map of your exact location.

Real Time Competition:  By sharing your success you are automatically entered into all the leagues relevant for you.

League Leaders Win Prizes!: At the end of the month there will be fishing related prizes on offer. 

Create Your Own Match: Pit you or your team against other anglers or teams and clubs around the same lake, or even different lakes, and stay informed on the competition without waiting till the end of the day weigh-in. 

Mobile Fishing Tips: Easy access expert advice at your fingertips.

And these are just some of the early input from some very keen Anglers. I’d like to get your input too:  https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/FishLook

Risks & Challenges

With the funding the only challenge I see is making sure we have enough Anglers joining in, downloading the app and sharing their successes. I have access to some expert developers who are briefed and ready to go – they just need me to bait-up and cast the line into the water !  So we are nearly there - we just need to get support from some keen anglers to spread the word, and contribute the price of a cup of tea and a slice of toast !

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help:

·  Please get the word out and share www.FishLook.co.uk with your friends, fellow anglers and Fishing Clubs.

·  Share the survey link, share the web page and share this page on Indiegogo.

With your funding and help Fishing is about to get a lot more Fun and Interactive !

story:
Pick Interests

By analysing your interests and weather forecast Biliki creates list of recommended tours specifically for you. We only publish tours which have been specifically designed and tailored by our expedition team.

 

Follow the Routes

Follow the routes through interactive map before and while travelling. Be prepared, study the distance, road and trail conditions. Check out the photos and fascinating stories about touristic sites. Download tours and get best experience even offline.

 

Enjoy Safe Journey

Integrated safety system will monitor your trip and alert in case you deviate from the route. Monitoring system will give you statistical information of your trip, which can be stored in your travel history. In case of an emergency you will be able to call local emergency services.

 

Receive Hints and Recommendations

Recommendations about hotels and restaurants will be provided only based on our personal experiences and genuine user reviews. Hints and tips will help you to avoid tourist traps and cut costs.

 

Share with Friends

Invite your friends to inbuilt social tool - Campfire, to plan ahead and share your views on tours. Exchange photos, ideas, impressions and experiences.

 

Features

 

Biliki Timeline

 

Our Values

Biliki is based on three main values

We started in Georgia

 

Milestones for next 3 years

  • Equip Biliki with chatbot to enhance user experience by adopting AI solutions.
  • Expand to Azerbaijan and Armenia and cover Caucasus region with Biliki tours.
  • Expand to Europe.

 

Our Core Team

 

Spread the word and contribute to Tourism Development

Back Up the project and help us bring you outstanding Travel App

story:
As Ex-test Pilot / Aircraft engineer, we know what a real pilot need to have fun.

 

 

Ospreyd-Drone is speedy, it´s fun, It´s Osprey bird.

 

 

 

A Multirotor copter-Drone with many capabilities.

 

 

 

 

The concept ideas are to design and develop a new speed Drone Copter Model for sporting and filming, that will be using a central elevating engine. That will be maneuvering like Osprey bird.

That will be having clear camera view, just like Osprey bird eyes.

That will be fun to pilots and upcoming pilots.

A real challenging air competitions system.

The Ospreyd-14D meet all these demands.

 

 

 

 

The Ospreyd will be used for reality Air-game-sport called

“Catch me if you can”.

Imagine two Osprey bird on air fighting for a fish.

 

 

The reality Sports Game “for PC and real Live-time” is going under development.

The future of Ospreyd-Drone will be having colored water Guns on board.

The Drones will be fighting and shooting with colored water.

This will make air sport for a real pilot more challenging and fun.

 

It´s just a Game...

 

Follow us for more info’s and help to make this a reality.

For this, we need co-partner on IT and Game-Program

Especially, we need backers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Ospreyd-Drone System:

The gearwheels-engine

 

 

 

Rolling engine

 

 

 

 

 

 

Right-Left Rolls

 

 

 

 

Looping and Speed engine

 

 

 

 

 

Back Looping

 

 

 

Front and back camera like Osprey bird eyes.

 

 

 

 

Battery wallet

 

 

A Drone for speedy fun, featuring:

. Sensor Assisted Flying

. Auto-Leveling

. Live-Streaming Video

. View Headset Display

. Editing Suite

. Social Media Integration

. Expansion Packs

. Modular Design Technology

 

 

 

Design in Speed Game.

 

Sensors work together to achieve amazingly and stable flight

Sending video to a smartphone or virtual reality headset

 

Ospreyd-Drone is bringing new technology and functionality,

whilst making the end product affordable to all.

 

 

 

Ospreyd-14D Building instruction (the book)

 

 

 

Ospreyd-14D Basic:

Complete body parts, back propellers, elevator propellers, and gearwheel systems.

 

 

 

Ospreyd-14D Standard:

Complete Body parts, back propellers, and engines, elevator propellers, gearwheel systems and engine, RC receiver, Pilot-Leveling system, RC sender, battery.

 

 

The supporting technologies

RC system

Battery

Electric Engine

Pilot Leveling

 

Other Supporting Modular Technologies

Battery charger

Auto-pilot leveling system

video

Camera

Headset with RC-System

RC with monitor

Smartphone Integration

Sensor Assisted Flying

Live-Streaming Video

View Headset Display

Editing Suite

Social Media Integration

Expansion Packs

 

 

 

 

PEAKS

 

PEAK 1: Anything

Support this project with any of your supports.

And get the project gallery Pictures.

 

PEAK 2:  1 Building instructions book  ($ 79)

Get the Building instructions book

for building the Ospreyd-14D Speed Drone yourself

 

PEAK 3: Ospreyd-14D Basic Model ($ 250)

Get the Basic Model

A complete body set plus Building instructions book.

 

PEAK 4:  Ospreyd-14D Standard Model ($ 600)

Get the Standard Model

A complete body set build together with engine/gearwheel.

Including, Electronic: Level Pilot, RC System, Battery.

Just ready for flying. No camera.

 

PEAK 5:  Ospreyd-14D Premium Model (1) ($ 955)

A complete body set build together with engine/gearwheel.

Including, Electronic: Level Pilot, RC System, Battery.

Just ready for flying.

Including camera system

 

PEAK 6: Opreyd-14D Premium Model (2) ($ 1600)

The complete body set build together with engine/gearwheel.

Including, Electronic: Level Pilot, RC System, Battery

Just ready for flying.

Including

Battery charger

Auto-pilot leveling system

video-Front and back Camera

Headset with RC-System

RC with monitor

Smartphone Integration

Sensor Assisted Flying

Live-Streaming Video

View Headset Display

Editing Suite

Social Media Integration

Plus carrying Case.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

1. Manufacturing and Developing Partnership

We are always exploring new manufacturer.

We are also looking for product partnerships that will allow us to expand our company sustainably. From manufacturing to packaging and accessories.

2. We are looking for IT and Game programming how will work with us.

3. We are looking for retailers in the US and worldwide to sell our product and to bring our technology to developing companies.

 

 

Check our updates for development info´s

story:
Who am I?

My name is Todd.  I am 51 years old and I love to travel.  I work in the transportation, logistics, and process management field so I travel 40-50 trips per year.  I am married to the most incredible woman I have ever known.  

The Tabuum idea came to me when I was flying to California and had to move my tablet so the flight attendant could place the food on my tray table.  When i arrived in California I went to a local store and purchased two bathroom shower suction cups and a snake light.  With the help of a friend I put together a very basic concept of a Tabuum just to see if it would actually work and hold my tablet and stick to the tray table.  And wow did it work!  Over the past 4 months and with a lot of help I have produced a working and highly functional prototype and I have used it during 8 recent flights.  Several flight attendants have remarked "what is that?" "where did you buy it?" and "wow, that is the coolest thing I have seen on a plane".  Those comments, along with several others, got me really excited and thinking that I am on to something special.

I have come up with ideas in the past and have never had the resources to take them to market.  I wanted something beautiful, highly functional, and not made from plastic that will break over time.  This time I decided that this product is just too useful to let it fall by the wayside.  Please help us take this great idea to market and allow us to develop other innovative ideas.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

We will use the money we receive to purchase materials, pay for a company to machine the aluminum and anodize the parts.  We also need to design and buy the custom rubber suction cups.  We need do things like, register for a patent, register a trademark, build a website, and develop packaging and user manuals.  Unfortunately, we will also need to pay for liability insurance and for attorney's to help us with all of the legal stuff.

I am new to this entire process and will require professional assistance throughout the process. But with your help I know we can make the Tabuum a success.  

  • Any pledge amount $5.00 to $24.99 the person will be entered into a drawing to receive a free Tabuum when it becomes available!
  • Any pledge amount $25.00 to $49.99 the person will receive 20% off the retail price of the Tabuum when it becomes available.
  • For every $50.00 pledge you will receive a $25.00 gift card to Restaurants.com where you can choose what restaurant you would like to go to.  You will also receive 20% off the retail price of the Tabuum when it becomes available.
  • If you pledge $100.00 you will receive a free Tabuum when it is available.  The projected retail price will be in the range of $119.99 - $149.99 depending on surface finish and cost of the aluminum at time of manufacture plus applicable tax.  The purchaser will be responsible for all shipping charges and duties plus applicable taxes/VAT if any.  *one per pledge.

How does the Tabuum help you?

  • If you travel as much as I do or just want to use the Tabuum at home or in your office you definitely WANT one. 
  • The Tabuum helps reduce neck strain by placing your tablet or phone at the right viewing height.  The Tabuum is suction based and wont mar any surface.
  • The Tabuum will not leave permanent (light film ring cleans off with rubbing alcohol or glass cleaner) marks on the surface you attach it to or on your tablet or cell phone.  The rubber suction cups work exceptionally well as long as you clean the surface you are attaching to.  The aluminum outer cup never touches your tablet, phone, or attached surface.

Risks & Challenges

In my industry I am a fixer and a problem solver.  I work relentlessly to overcome complex business and technical problems on a daily basis.  I have spent the last several months overcoming design challenges and other significant issues to simply make the Tabuum prototype a reality.  I have had to learn how to 3D Print parts, learn CAD software, and sleep on a friends couch in the US for weeks on end just to bring the idea to life.

Some of the risks are that we cannot get the Tabuum produced in a cost effective manner due to the rising cost of aluminum and the cost of the CNC machining work that is required.  I am doing everything possible to have the Tabuum manufactured in the US by a small CNC machine shop because I believe in supporting small businesses.  Building a solid relationship with a small hungry CNC machine shop in the US where I can watch over the machining process personally and make changes on the fly are crucial to the success of the Tabuum.

Other Ways You Can Help

Believe me I understand that life is always challenging and giving money to a project is not always possible even if you believe in the concept.  If you can't contribute financially you can help us by spreading the word, linking to our project via social media, and or sharing your thoughts with us about the design, process, packaging, etc.  Or if you are an attorney who would be willing to assist us at a discounted rate, an engineer, web designer, (I am not any of those) who would be willing to help us, please reach out to me.

Who am I?
My name is Todd.  I am 51 years old and I love to travel.  I work in the transportation, logistics, and process management field so I travel 40-50 trips per year.  I am married to the most incredible woman I have ever known.  
The Tabuum idea came to me when I was flying to California and had to move my tablet so the flight attendant could place the food on my tray table.  When i arrived in California I went to a local store and purchased two bathroom shower suction cups and a snake light.  With the help of a friend I put together a very basic concept of a Tabuum just to see if it would actually work and hold my tablet and stick to the tray table.  And wow did it work!  Over the past 4 months and with a lot of help I have produced a working and highly functional prototype and I have used it during 8 recent flights.  Several flight attendants have remarked "what is that?" "where did you buy it?" and "wow, that is the coolest thing I have seen on a plane".  Those comments, along with several others, got me really excited and thinking that I am on to something special.
I have come up with ideas in the past and have never had the resources to take them to market.  I wanted something beautiful, highly functional, and not made from plastic that will break over time.  This time I decided that this product is just too useful to let it fall by the wayside.  Please help us take this great idea to market and allow us to develop other innovative ideas.  
 

What We Need & What You Get
We will use the money we receive to purchase materials, pay for a company to machine the aluminum and anodize the parts.  We also need to design and buy the custom rubber suction cups.  We need do things like, register for a patent, register a trademark, build a website, and develop packaging and user manuals.  Unfortunately, we will also need to pay for liability insurance and for attorney's to help us with all of the legal stuff.
I am new to this entire process and will require professional assistance throughout the process. But with your help I know we can make the Tabuum a success.  

Any pledge amount $5.00 to $24.99 the person will be entered into a drawing to receive a free Tabuum when it becomes available!
Any pledge amount $25.00 to $49.99 the person will receive 20% off the retail price of the Tabuum when it becomes available.
For every $50.00 pledge you will receive a $25.00 gift card to Restaurants.com where you can choose what restaurant you would like to go to.  You will also receive 20% off the retail price of the Tabuum when it becomes available.
If you pledge $100.00 you will receive a free Tabuum when it is available.  The projected retail price will be in the range of $119.99 - $149.99 depending on surface finish and cost of the aluminum at time of manufacture plus applicable tax.  The purchaser will be responsible for all shipping charges and duties plus applicable taxes/VAT if any.  *one per pledge.


How does the Tabuum help you?

If you travel as much as I do or just want to use the Tabuum at home or in your office you definitely WANT one. 
The Tabuum helps reduce neck strain by placing your tablet or phone at the right viewing height.  The Tabuum is suction based and wont mar any surface.
The Tabuum will not leave permanent (light film ring cleans off with rubbing alcohol or glass cleaner) marks on the surface you attach it to or on your tablet or cell phone.  The rubber suction cups work exceptionally well as long as you clean the surface you are attaching to.  The aluminum outer cup never touches your tablet, phone, or attached surface.


Risks & Challenges
In my industry I am a fixer and a problem solver.  I work relentlessly to overcome complex business and technical problems on a daily basis.  I have spent the last several months overcoming design challenges and other significant issues to simply make the Tabuum prototype a reality.  I have had to learn how to 3D Print parts, learn CAD software, and sleep on a friends couch in the US for weeks on end just to bring the idea to life.
Some of the risks are that we cannot get the Tabuum produced in a cost effective manner due to the rising cost of aluminum and the cost of the CNC machining work that is required.  I am doing everything possible to have the Tabuum manufactured in the US by a small CNC machine shop because I believe in supporting small businesses.  Building a solid relationship with a small hungry CNC machine shop in the US where I can watch over the machining process personally and make changes on the fly are crucial to the success of the Tabuum.

Other Ways You Can Help
Believe me I understand that life is always challenging and giving money to a project is not always possible even if you believe in the concept.  If you can't contribute financially you can help us by spreading the word, linking to our project via social media, and or sharing your thoughts with us about the design, process, packaging, etc.  Or if you are an attorney who would be willing to assist us at a discounted rate, an engineer, web designer, (I am not any of those) who would be willing to help us, please reach out to me.

story:
Convertible Functions and Ways to Play：:

Understand the Great Design in Details: 

Merits Compared with 5 Traditional Products:

 

 

Two Printed Patterns and Two Retail Packs 

Accessories Included in Standard Retail Pack

Installation Guides:

--To make an arch canopy overhead the boat/bed/pool, press threaded studs on edge of chamber 3 into rings on ends of chamber 4. Inflate enough air into Chamber 4

--To have more space inside boat/bed, 

a. Put Chamber 5 or 4 outside boat and tie to bow

b. Bend Chamber 4 to an arch, tie its 2 ends with rope holders on top of Chamber 1

c. Deflate Chamber 2 completely or partially

--To have open view when boating, erect Chamber 5 tie to bow

--To enlarge the floating island, lay and  tie 2 or more cushions  to slideway

--To make water sliding safer, erect and tie 2 or more cushions to slideway

--To use motor propeller with canopy, bend Chamber 4 to form an arch, tie its 2 ends with 4 oar holders on Chamber 1

Story and Timeline

Inventor--Frank Huang

--Apr. 2016, Started to Design

After running my own business in tarping system industry successfully for 10 years, since Apr. 2016, I started thinking about a trial on consumer goodsand on-line business, so to make my career life an integrated one, to make my “investment” on my MBA degree ( from the University of British Columbia, Vancouver, CANADA) a more worthy one.

As I love summer, beach, swimming and camping and I am familiar with Vinyl / PVC coated fabrics that can be made into tarps, mats and professional marine-class boats etc., I decided to invent a versatile, big size, comfortable but affordable inflatable water toy / water sports product that can be used by any family for all main outdoor and indoor activities at anywhere.

--Aug. 2016, Finished Design and Testing, Patent Applied in US, Canada and China

Arch Ark seems a great design:

It got an order once it was listed on Amazon, the order was from London, UK, from a famous Fashion Show model. 

Even professionals have been working in the inflatable toy industry for dozens of years shew great interest on Arch Ark: The CEO of Aqua Leisure, one of the largest water toy designers, manufacturers and distributors in North America, wrote to me:” Frank, I am interested in this item for both the sporting goods trade and pool business a smaller version..”

--Jan. 2017, Signed Contract with Manufacturer

As Arch Ark is a big size product, the manufacturer needs to invest a big welding machine, so they set 5000 as minimum order quantity.   I used up all my own money and borrowed a lot from almost all channels ( friends, relatives and financial institutes) , finally paid 35% deposit and signed the contract.

--Feb.-Apr. 2017, manufacturer finished buying, installing new machine, finished making       moulds and production of 1700 pcs

--Mar. 2017, Patent awarded in China

--Jun. 2017, 1700 Arch Arks were delivered to US and Canada.

--Jun.- Aug. 2017, Sales on Amazon was not good

Amazon has lots of limits for seller accounts, especially we are not allowed to upload videos. As most buyers found us by originally searching key words such as boat, tent, air mattress, water slide and kids pool etc., without video, buyers are difficult to understand the extra values/functions of Arch Ark, so they just simply feel our price is higher than the above mentioned 5 main categories with single function and are unwilling to pay for the extra functions.  

Moreover, as new seller, we have to use Amazon’s pay-per-click service to show to buyers, but this service is very expensive: It often reaches US$1.5 or more per click in the summer season. We were ever charged US$1000 in two hours.

--Sep. 2017, manufacturing stopped as per our request

However, actually manufacturer had made 1500 more by the time we informed them.

--Now

The manufacturer is still urging us to pay the 70% balance so they can finish this contract, as we don't have more money to pay this part, we only can keep begging them allowing us to fulfil this contract later…We are worrying:

  • If they finally lose patience and take a legal action, asking us to pay the balance plus fine, we may lose more money.
  • We lose their trust, thus can not keep good relationship with them in future. Such relationship is precious for us, because the manufacturer has good understanding on making this product, they are also licensed supplier of Walmart,Costco, Target etc., the quality of our product will be guaranteed. Also they helped us a lot in developing this product, so I feel I owe them too much even as to my moral standard…

We now want to raise mini. 10,000 fund to:

--Return money to my cousin, who lent me money to develop product and pay contract deposit. So he can pay for immediate medication for his son’s progressive blindness due to sort of genetic disease. I feel so “guilty” that I can not return him on time, such delay results in his son's eyes in danger…I often suffer insomnia for such sense lately.

If we can raise more than 10,000, we will:

--Pay off the money we borrowed, at least stop paying interest as soon as possible.

--Gradually pay to the manufacturer to finish the rest 70% of the contract, so we can keep good relationship with them. And this product can be shared by more families in the world.

To show our appreciation to all backers, we offer an Indiegogo-only huge discount based on the MSRP US$250; also we will provide free accessories.

If we don't reach our entire goal, we will Still ship Arch Arks to backers so they can

--significantly save money as Arch Ark is multifunctional

--have a trial to make their summer happier

--give us feedback to improve our product further

--use their word of mouth or networking to share their experience with all people in the world, so all families can save money and enjoy this amazing product!

If the fund reaches more than our goal, especially the reflective quantity more than 3200, we can make more in 1 to 2 months then deliver to backers.

Risks & Challenges

Basically, there is NO RISK for this project, because the campaign goal is 10,000, the reflective quantity is  no more than 100, but we have 3200 (1728 in California, US and Vancouver, Canada; 1500 in Shanghai, China) Arch Arks ready to go.

If the fund raised reflects a quantity more than 3200 products,

--We can start delivery from China in 1 to 1.5 months, from North America in 1.5 to 2 months. That is because we only need to buy PVC materials, which will take 3 to 4 weeks to be made. Factory can make 200-300 Arch Arks a day, 300 units can fill a 20-foot container, if shipped from China to US west coast, 2 to 3 weeks is enough.

FAQs

--About Product

Can we use Arch Ark on surface with sands, such as beach? Or we can use it on even more coarse surface?

Though Arch Ark is made of 12 gauge / 0.30 mm (standard thickness for swimming pool in the market) PVC material, as it has no reinforcement cloth inside, like materials used to make professional marine-class inflatable boat, it is still possible to be cut/broken by sharp articles.

For users plan to use on coarse surface, we suggest to use a mat ( we also make very good garage floor mat, topped  No. 1 seller in Amazon Canada), put Arch Ark on the mat, you are much more carefree for piercing on Arch Ark.

Certainly, a little silver sand on surface of Arch Ark is definitely OK.

--About Shipping

How is your shipping arrangement, is it possible to ship worldwide?

We have established accounts with UPS, Fedex and Purolator covering US, Canada and the whole world. We get mini. 35% discount from above courier services, this discount has been reflected on the shipping costs we charge backers.

For shipping from China to other continents, we use DHL, we ever shipped Arch Ark order from China to London, UK.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share Arch Ark information with your friends and families and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools if that is not troublesome for you!

story:
About AbiliTrek

Our team is working on developing a Yelp-like review platform that provides accessibility reviews of public places allowing for people with disabilities to better know where they can or cannot go. We are setting out on this mission because:

  • We believe in equal accessibility for all humans, no matter their physical ability
  • We believe that if more people with disabilities knew about accessible places to go, they would explore more and experience new things
  • We have confidence that the community surrounding those with disabilities will adopt our service and help make our tool valuable for those with accessibility needs (they'll submit reviews so that others will know which locations are accessible).
  • Because we can!

 

Daman Wandke, our CEO and Founder, has Cerebral Palsy and travels frequently for both business and pleasure. He knows how difficult it is for people with disabilities to find accessible places and that is why Daman created AbiliTrek.

Accessibility information is extremely limited and oftentimes inaccurate. When someone with a disability wants to go out to eat, visit a coffee shop, or enjoy a drink at a bar, it's difficult for them to know which establishments can serve them. We are campaigning to support the development of AbiliTrek so that we can provide a vast amount of accessibility information to people with disabilities. With your help, navigating the world can become much easier for the nearly 50 million American's with disabilities by using the AbiliTrek website, and eventually the AbiliTrek Android and iOS apps.

 

Campaign Breakdown

It takes plenty of time and really talented people to make a great working product, so with your support we'll be able to achieve the following milestones:

Development of current product, AbiliTrek.com - $10,000. In our early stages, our website application will allow our users to review how accessible places are and also see other's accessibility reviews on our web platform.

Website Enhancements - $10,000. Reaching the $20,000 milestone in funding will allow us to improve our web platform of AbiliTrek to make it even more useful for our users. This will include features not yet implemented into our initial website and features requested from Beta testers.

Pilot City Launches and Conferences - $15,000. It is crucial for our users to find AbiliTrek useful, and without reviews it may not be. Meeting the $35,000 milestone would allow AbiliTrek to launch in 3 pilot cities; Seattle, WA, Washington D.C., and New York City. Initially serving these cities with high disability populations will allow users to quickly generate large amounts of accessibility reviews, making those cities more accessible using AbiliTrek. Additionally, attending disability related conferences will allow leaders in the disability community to adopt our service so that AbiliTrek can be brought back and used all over the United States.

Development of iOS Application - $30,000. Reaching our FINAL fundraising milestone of $65,000, we can serve our community of iOS users with disabilities. iOS devices are generally more accessible, and that is why we will first develop AbiliTrek for iOS users. We want our iOS users to be able to easily use AbiliTrek on the go, so that they can more easily navigate their everyday lives. With your very generously donated $30,000 we can make that possible.

 

AbiliTrek Rewards

ALL donators will receive access to exclusively BETA test our AbiliTrek before the public!

$25 Donation - AbiliTrek Travel Tag

$50 Donation - AbiliTrek Accessible Waterbottle

$75 Donation - AbiliTrek T-Shirt

$100 Donation - AbiliTrek Sweatshirt

$100 Donation - 60 Minute Accessibility Webinar by Daman Wandke

$200 Donation - 30 Minute 1 on 1 Chat with Daman Wandke, CEO

$300 Donation - 60 Minute 1 on 1 Chat with Daman Wandke, CEO

$500 Donation - 2 Hours of Accessibility Consulting

$1000 Donation - 6 Hours of Accessibility Consulting

More details on rewards are listed under "perks".

Tax included in donation price.

 

The Impact

Many people don't know how inaccessible our world is or how many people are dependent on accessible accommodations.

  • There are over 50 million people with disabilities in the United States. The majority of you likely know someone who has a physical disability, whether it's a friend, family member, or coworker.
  • It is extremely difficult for people with disabilities to find places they can get into, bathrooms they can use, or even tables they can sit at.
  • Your contribution to our campaign directly impacts the lives of those with disabilities. Every dollar donated helps make it possible for AbiliTrek to get into the hands of those with disabilities, making it easier for them to plan their days and live their lives.

 

Risks & Challenges

Risk - Success in completing our mission requires a large community of people to be involved. Gathering accessibility reviews and information is necessary for the AbiliTrek tool to be useful.

Opportunity - Advertising on multiple platforms in multiple ways will, both internally and outsourced, will yield a high number of involved community members, and therefor a high number of accessibility reviews.

Risk - The accessibility reviews provided by our users bring to light the fact that many places are not accessible.

Opportunity - This is an opportunity to for us to encourage our users to be honest in their reviews in order to bring awareness of accessibility to public businesses and locations.

Strength - Multiple members of our team have first hand knowledge of accessibility and disability. This allows our team to successfully serve our target users because they have experienced the problem we are solving.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • SHARE OUR STORY! It is just as helpful for you to share our mission to 5 others than it is to donate. Share our campaign to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or email or text it to anyone who might be interested. We appreciate any and all support!

story:
Click HERE for french version of the video | Cliquer ICI pour la version française de la vidéo

Following the success of our first Kickstarter's campaign in 2019, we have worked extremely hard on the structure of our company in order to offer you a service and products that meet your expectations. With many years of experience, we are now perfectly equipped and proud to create products specifically designed to allow you to go beyond the limits of your adventures. 

The 30L everyday bag will meet all your expectations, whatever they may be!

The Owly Packs hiker bag combines modernity and versatility - thanks to its double back opening and its refined look! This bag will meet all your expectations and will be your most practical partner during your outdoor activities and the best carry-on for travel. With its computer compartment and its multiple pockets for office items, it will also be the perfect bag for school or work. Owly Packs promises you unprecedented comfort. Attach the removable waist belt and go discover the world!

We care about your projects, your travels, your adventures and we care about you. Therefore, we will continue to innovate and create products with YOU in mind.

 100% CARRY-ON

We created the Hiker bag with the goal of giving you the ultimate everyday bag. Its versatility will allow it to become your ideal office, school, travel, outdoors or even motorcycle bag. You’ll see, its totally one bag to rule them all.

 

Thanks to the particular design of the shoulder straps sewing, the Hiker bag will perfectly mold the shape of your trapezoids and therefore be the most comfortable bag you’ll ever use. If you don't agree, we'll offer you a no-questions-asked refund!

You can also carry your bag by using either the top handle or the side one.

Full perimeter U-zipper for easy-access!

* Prices in orange are in USD and therefore may fluctuate due to the exchange rate.

* Prices in orange are in USD and therefore may fluctuate due to the exchange rate.

One more Hiker Bag

If you want to avoid making your road partner jealous, add one more Hiker Bag to your reward.

 

Hip Belt

Our waist belt attachment system gives you unmatched ease and speed of installation. Its Eva foam-type cushions reminiscent of memory foam are extremely comfortable and the adjustments allow them to fit all types of body.

Small straps

Use the small straps for external carry on the sides of your bag.

Large Straps

Use the large ones to secure gear at the back or even the side of the bag.

Aluminium Bottle

Choose between the black matte or the orange color.

Hammock-Tent

If you missed our first Kickstarter campaign, by purchasing the new Hiker bag, we are offering you the Owly Packs hammock-tent at a fraction of its retail price!

CREATIVE PROCESS AND PRODUCTION

When creating each of our products, we do a thorough analysis of what the market has to offer as well as what needs to be innovated in order to create exceptional equipment. We then collect our ideas and draw our first prototypes, which are reflected upon, redesigned, and improved over several months. Then, we write explanatory documents for each of the details that, combined, form our first physical prototype. This document gathers all the dimensions, choice of materials and exact emplacement of each element of the bag. Before we get to our final product, we create about ten prototypes, which go through all kinds of tests for durability, sealing, and long-term comfort. It is this thoroughness that allows us to offer you superior quality equipment, down to the smallest details.

Terms and conditions

International taxes are out of our control, it means that it's possible that you will have to pay various freight and duties or taxes according to your country, including VAT and GST Taxes.  We are going to make sure to assist you during this process if you need any help from us.

You can use that tool to calculate duties. Don't forget to convert U.S. dollars to your local currency.

International customers who are required to pay customs will receive an email from their local authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Once the payment is done, your order will be processed for final delivery.

story:
The Impact

This app will change the way we coordinate events between each other. Yes, there are group chats , online reviews, and search engines to help us find an amicable location for meetups,but MYCTY will take it multiple steps further and enable you to get dynamic ideas and start the ball rolling as soon as possible with the smallest amount of time necessary. 

Add your friends to your plans and MYCTY can also determine some common and convenient locations for activities OR you can browse TINs ( itineraries) recommended by influencers and celebrities and take on an adventure!

This app will help us spend more time with one another by avoiding the dreadful process of coordinating plans and enhance our lives by becoming more exposed to different experiences with people we enjoy!

Additionally, we will help increase foot traffic to participating businesses such as restaurants, stores, and event and activity providers ! The app will only feature recommendations and not reviews to keep our community positive. 

MYCTY app also plans to make an impacton the tourism industry. Tourists, both domestic and international, can have local experiences based on recommendations from locals and influencers.

Risks & Challenges

Because this app is uniquely robust, app development challenges will be inevitable. The app will have all the bells and whistleswe envision, but they will be offered in different stages of the development. The added features will be scheduled and userswill be upgraded tomore and more features as the development stage progresses.

We will also expand the use of the app we develop for Los Angeles to be used as a template for other U.S. cities!

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate your support to help bring life to the MYCTY app and you could further help us by sharing this memorandum with your friends. Perhaps you know people who are looking to invest in tech and social media ventures.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Summary

“Hello everyone! A couple of years ago, a girl called Vos happily moved from Belgium to Portugal. She immediately started to explore her new Wonderland - on foot, by train, by car, by boat, from the air: she really turned this country upside down and inside out. She very much enjoyed sharing the hidden gems she discovered with her friends, and her enthusiasm proved to be contagious. 

I went to visit her a couple of times myself and immediately wanted to move to Portugal! (Unfortunately reality beckoned so I am still based in a rather rainy part of Europe…*)

Anyway, back in 2014 she embarked for a jolly summer trip through Portugal with friends, as she had done several times before. The pictures these friends shared on social media of Vos dropping dead in front of her favourite landscapes, monuments and beaches proved to be so funny, that a professional photographer proposed hitting the road with Vos and taking magnificent pictures of her all over the country. And that is exactly what they did.

The result of their many travels through Portugal will now become a photo book and personal travel guide called ‘To Die For: Portugal’. That is: if they can find the money to edit, print and distribute this book worldwide. A lot of money is required to do that… ”

*Belgium

What We Need & What You Get

We need a lot of funds to get this book published. Through your donation, you are doing yourself a favour: besides the travel guide, you'll receive tons of good karma, and possibly some other great rewards. 

You can get your hands on one of the first copies of 'To Die For: Portugal': a photo book and travel guide for people who like to travel the way Vos (texts) and Yves (pictures) do. Meaning: happily drifting and meandering through the landscape, hitting the road with only a vague goal in mind (“let’s head North”) and ending up at a table with locals. Thus accidentally discovering hidden gems, being guided to absolutely fabulous places by locals, or find yourself suddenly in the middle of breath-taking landscapes... 

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks attached to your donation. 'To Die For: Portugal' will be printed and distributed, even in the unlikely case we don't reach our target amount. Fact is the more we collect, the more books we can print and distribute. All donations are welcome to give this book the opportunities it deserves. And everyone who donates always gets what is subscribed for. 'To Die For: Portugal' will be launched in November-December 2019 - an ideal end-of-year gift!

Follow us and spread the word!

  • Find us on Instagram

  • Our Facebook page

Credits 

All 'To Die For: Portugal' pictures © Studio Yves Callewaert. Video by Niel Verduyckt. Business support by Manu Mathys. All texts and serial death drop activities by Vos.

story:
Tashtego is the ultimate solution to the long-suffering toiletries bag. Inspired by the neat and organized design of tool rolls, Tashtego is a clean, sanitary, minimalist way to organize and store all your travel essentials.

Say goodbye to hair in toothbrushes and exploded shampoo over your razor. With Tashtego, all your brushes, razors, and bottles are securely separated from each other and easy to find.

Roll up all your personal care tools in a neat, organized, easily displayable kit. Never search for your toiletries again!

 

Tashtego 2.0 is an better, more functional version of our first design. We read all the reviews (both positive and negative) and worked with a group of our most die-hard fans to reinvent, enhance, and improve our 1.0 product.

If you’ve ever travelled, you know the pain of carrying your hygiene essentials. Ziploc bags get messy and gross - and the “high end” toiletry bags are even worse... 

Everything mixes together, gets lost, and leaks all sorts of goo, gunk, and grossness over the very tools you use to clean yourself.

Do you enjoy digging through the black hole of toiletries?

How about your toothbrush having a three-way with your hairbrush and toe nail clippers?

Or your shampoo spilling all over your essentials?

Are you tired of sorting through junk just to find your personal hygiene tools dirty and disgusting?

It’s time for a change.

 

Tashtego keeps all your toiletries separate and organized. No more digging and no more inappropriate make out sessions between hygiene items.

Mesh pockets keep your essentials neatly organized and easy to find - so you can grab what you need when you need them. Plus, you can lay Tashtego flat or hang it up for easy access.

All Your Essentials Organized

Lay flat or hang!

Camping, backpacking, vacations, business trips, festivals, retreats and more - Tashtego is perfect for any and every travel situation.  

Throw it in your bag or suitcase without worry. You’ll save space while keeping your toiletries safe from each other and the rest of your bag.

Tashtego 2.0 also expands and contracts based on what you put in it. Save extra space if you’re leaving for a weekend and pack extra for that long vacation.

Plus, Tashtego 2.0 makes TSA easy to pass! Simply pull it out for screening. Your items will be easily and fully displayed for the TSA agent - no worries, no hassle, no mess.

Durable Waterproof Nylon

Tashtego 2.0 is made from heavy-duty, high-strength nylon. This makes it ultra-durable, ultra-light, and 100% waterproof. Plus, the exterior is soft and nice to the touch.

Tashtego 2.0 is completely machine washable!

 

Mesh Stretch Pockets

We replaced our canvas pockets with durable, unidirectional stretchable mesh pockets. This lets you easily see all your content and makes Tashtego more secure and versatile. Carry your full-size toothbrush, toothpaste, floss, hairbrush, razor, everything without worry.

You can even store items smaller than the pocket! They’ll still be safely secured thanks to the mesh lining.

Anti-Sag Technology

Because they only stretch one way, our pockets will never stretch out on you. This means you don’t have to worry about baggy lining or losing the tight snug of your mesh overtime or over use.

Tashtego 2.0 lasts - pockets and all. 

Silicone Bead Backing

To make sure your items stay snug in Tashtego’s pockets, we added a silicone bead backing that prevents your things from sliding out.

Small or large, your essentials will be tight and secure in Tashtego. No more slipping and sliding. 

 

YKK Zipper Side Pocket

Our side zipper pockets lets you stash away smaller items and small liquid bottles - so they don’t spill everywhere. The zippers are made by YKK - the world’s leading zipper manufacturer - which means you’re in good hands.

 

Top Flap Pockets

Our top flap keeps all your essentials clean and keeps out water, dust, and any undesirables. But that’s not it. With Tashtego 2.0, we added additional pockets for your small stash items - such as nail clippers and chapstick.

Get even more from the same awesome design everyone loves!

Lay Flat Design

Tashtego lays flat on its back - keeping your brushes and razors away from the bacterial cesspool called the countertop. Lay it down on any counter and easily find your essentials in a flash!

Dual Metal Grommets

If there’s no place to lay your Tashtego, you can also hang it! Dual metal grommets lets you hang Tashtego practically anywhere.

Hang diagonally or levelled! We added an extra grommet so you can have your toiletries leveled and secure while hanging. Whether it’s a towel rack, shower curtain, or even a tree - you’ll have all your personal care tools at arms reach!

G-Hook Strap

We replaced our old notched strap with a versatile G-hook that clips onto a daisy chain of webbing - letting you tighten and loosen your Tashtego as needed, with zero slack.

Wrap up your minimalist setup or roll up your entire countertop setup! Tashtego will accommodate all your needs and firmly close without extra space between the roll. Get full, secure closure - no matter what!

Though we created Tashtego for our hygiene tools, people have used it for much more than that. Whether it’s for camera gear, medical tools, everyday carries, lotion or as a knife roll - use Tashtego for whatever you need! 

The durable material and compact design makes it ideal for any situation where you need your tools clean, separated, organized, and ready to go!

 

Tashtego is the ultimate travel toiletries kit. No more unsanitary messes or mixing of brushes - keep all your personal care essentials compact, ready to go and easy to find!

 

Hi, I’m Parker.

I like to make things. I make pens, knives, treehouses, drones and, now, anything else my kids want to make. But the biggest thing I’ve made is an airplane.

Yeah, the kind you get in and fly. I flew it all over our beautiful country - Death Valley, Maine, Florida, through the Bahamas and other places where the “airport” is really just a patch of crushed coral or a clearing carved out of the forest. These are places where there aren’t mechanics to work on airplanes, so taking tools along is a pretty good idea.

Airplanes can only lift a certain amount of weight and there isn’t much space, so you have to think carefully about what to take and how to pack it. Getting smacked in the face by a floating wrench really hurts.

That’s when I fell in love with tool rolls. Tool rolls can be small, barely larger than the tools themselves, the individual pockets keep everything organized and, since they’re made out of fabric, they don’t weigh much. It’s easy to see if you’re leaving a wrench buried in the grass. Mine didn’t have to be nice, so I usually made them myself.  

So I launched the first version of Tashtego - the tool roll for your toiletries - on Kickstarter with huge success. 1,400 backers raised over $57,000 to make it a reality! I manufactured the products and shipped them around the world. 

People liked the product, but 1400 backers had lots of ideas for improvement.   So I hired a professional design firm and, together 15 of our most diehard fans,  we improved all the things we loved and added new features to solve the problems of the 1.0. 

Now, we’re ready to get the new, improved Tashtego to you and reinvent toiletry travel bags forever. 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 750+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $330MM raised between them.

story:
One of the joys of fishing is manipulating a fly to fool a fish or feel a fish in deep water. Fishing with a very fine line helps a fisher to keep the line above water more easily and have a better contact between the rod and fly.

Tanuki Ninja offers all the joys while offering the ultimate effectiveness in fishing. The advantage of Tanuki Ninja is its flexibility and sensitivity. The flexibility of the rod helps cast a very fine line without much effort and the sensitivity gives the fisher additional indicator to feel/detect a fish bite in deep water. Tanuki Ninja makes casting with a very fine line truly effortless. 

 

 

Tanuki Ninja’s design is based on Japanese tenkara fishing style that originated in Japan hundreds of years ago for commercial fishers. It is the simplest way of fly fishing. It requires just a rod, a line and a fly, and no reel is necessary. Without a reel, it is easy to learn to fly fish for newcomers or just to focus on fun of fishing for experienced fly fishers.

Specs:
Full Length:  about 11' 6" / ~ 350 cm
Closed Length: about 22.25" / 57 cm
Weight: about 2.2 oz / 63g - it is possibly the world lightest for a rod that is longer than 11' (335cm). 
Segments : 8

Production Process

I have spent several weeks at the manufacturer's facility to work with rod engineers to build a custom computer model library for Tanuki rods.



Testing prototypes

TO CONNECT LINE TO THE ROD

Fluorocarbon line is better because it is lighter but at the same time it is harder to see. It would take sometime to get used to it.

Loop to loop connection( Tanuki floating line or furled line)


To connect the fluorocarbon line without or with stopping knot


It is very easy to custom make the line length.  

CASTING - a very fine line with Tanuki rod is an EFFORTLESS.

Keep your wrist vertical, tip section bent but not the rod, and relax the grip
Cast with speed but no force because the line is very light and the rod tip is very flexible. It is a continuous casting without pause on backcast because the line is light and short, there is no mass on the line.

DRY FLY MANIPULATION

Simple and effective. 

DIVING DEEP INTO TECHNICAL 
ROD ACTION
Fishing rod action is a combination of Power Flex and Casting Flex. 

Power Flex is defined by line weight or lure weight. To define power flex, rod makers hang a weight on the tip of the rod, to find out how much weight for a rod bend down to a third of the rod. More weight means heavier line. Tenkara rod is new and the line is so fine, there is no standard available yet. I am working on it.  

 

Casting Flex is defined by fast, medium and slow. The rod bend close to the tip will be faster. When it is casted, the air resistance bends the rod.

LINES

Monofilament Pros: easy to keep the line above water for dry fly, or sink fast for nymphing.  Cons: low visibility.
Tanuki Floating Line - high quality floating line. It is in between monofilament and furled line. Pros: it is hi-vis, light, water resistant and has no memory, best for dry or dropper fishing. Cons: float, need longer tTippet for nymphing.
Furled Line Pros: easy to cast, hi-vis. Cons: absorbs water and sinks, fixed-length, easy to get tangled and get dirty.

HIGH STICK NYMPHING - Euro-Nymphing, Czech Nymphing, Tactical Nymphing

Both Nissin Pal level line and Tanuki floating line can be used for both dry fly and tactical nymphing.

BIG FISH LANDING

Bring the fish closer to water surface if you can. 

READING WATER  (coming soon) and more

Development time line

Publication
Tanuki Ninja is featuring on international prestigious design magazines which cover best international product designs, like Yanko Design and Japanese Axis. 


 

 

          

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

Developing this rod has long been in the works. The biggest challenge has been creating a premium quality rod while keeping the price affordable.

I have been producing Tenkara Tanuki rods for several years now and have a good track record of being able to deliver superb quality products which provide consistent high performance.

After we reach our funding goal, we will buy all the materials and begin production. It is a new rod model, but I am confident in the design as this rod has been tested since the summer of 2016. I plan to start delivering in early May. The manufacturer is ready to roll and we are just waiting for funds to give them the green light. 

We are offering free lifetime warranties – no questions asked.

Other Ways You Can Help

I need your help to spread the word out to your friends and social media.

One of the joys of fishing is manipulating a fly to fool a fish or feel a fish in deep water. Fishing with a very fine line helps a fisher to keep the line above water more easily and have a better contact between the rod and fly.

Tanuki Ninja offers all the joys while offering the ultimate effectiveness in fishing. The advantage of Tanuki Ninja is its flexibility and sensitivity. The flexibility of the rod helps cast a very fine line without much effort and the sensitivity gives the fisher additional indicator to feel/detect a fish bite in deep water. Tanuki Ninja makes casting with a very fine line truly effortless.
