story:
Your *Flawless* International Power Plug

You need to stay connected when you travel. You visit different countries every year. You have lots of devices. Boring old chargers are obsolete. Charwego is your universal travel adapter. Charge six devices in more than two hundred countries across the world. The charger that changes your life.

MacBook Charging

Most international travel adapters are not strong enough to charge a MacBook Pro or comparable laptops. Charwego was specifically designed for your laptop.

You can use Charwego for your travels and for home. There’s no reason to pay for overpriced chargers when Charwego does a better job for less. 

Make Everywhere Home

You can now confidently explore (almost) every country in the world. Charwego’s four different built-in adapters give you international freedom.

Don’t be afraid to get lost in the streets of Paris or the markets of Bali. Charwego works on every continent. Find a small restaurant or cafe and plug in your Charwego. You can easily plot your route home or say hi to Mom.

All you have to do is slide one of the side buttons.

Charge Six Devices At the Same Time

When you trek through a city all you’ll need is one “pit stop.” Connect your phone, camera, earphones, and laptop. All devices charge while you sip a coffee or exotic cocktail and get ready for the second half of your day.

Works just as well at home. With Charwego one outlet charges all your devices.

Charwego includes 1 USB-C port, 4 USB-A ports, and a universal AC outlet.

Super Speedy Charging

Charwego isn’t your dad’s phone charger. It’s got serious power.

Charge a 13” MacBook Pro in around two hours and 15 mins. Charge an iPhone 11 Pro or Samsung Galaxy S20 from zero to half-charge in just thirty minutes.

 

You know what’s even better? Charging one device doesn’t slow down how quickly others get charged. So all six of your devices will enjoy powerful charges.

One Adapter For All Your Adventures

Most travel adapters are ridiculously expensive! It typically comes out to $20 for every country! Just in Europe you would have to buy three: Continental, UK, and Scotland. That’s crazy.

With Chargwego you just press & slide the side buttons. Change adapters from France, to Egypt, to Mexico in just seconds.

Auto-Resetting Fuse

Protect your device when you travel. When you are traveling, your phone or laptop might accidentally draw too much power. Most adapters break when that happens. Charwego’s special auto-resetting fuse protects your device and your adapter.

Power Up Instead of Slowing Down

Charwego is super light and the same size as a credit card! You won’t even realize it’s there until you grab it to quickly power all your devices.

Your bag and luggage stay mobile and light on all your journeys. Keep in your purse or laptop bag for maximum convenience.

 

Always Safe

And JUST in case something were to happen... Charwego is pet and baby proof. That big universal A/C plug has a baby shield built into it. So if someone goes poking around absolutely nothing will happen!

You can confidently leave your Charwego anywhere in your kitchen, office, or bedside. Whatever is the most convenient for you.

Your High Wattage Devices Too!

Charwego really does it all. Charge even your neediest devices. That includes stuff like a hair dryer, straightener, or electric kettle.

Charwego makes your life easier and more convenient. Uncover a world of stress-free travel and lodging. Make any location your home no matter your lifestyle.

Design Process

Charwego was carefully designed for convenience and efficiency. Our original inspiration comes from the Apple iMacG3. You can pick between blue or black. 

Unboxing Video  

 

 

Product Comparison Video 

 

Device Testing 

Specification

Product Comparison 

Reward & Add On

What is Pacum? 

The most powerful, multi-functional, handheld vacuum in the world. Double your capacity and compress travel items 4x faster!

 

TimeLine

Are you a distributor or retailer?

Your customers will love that Charwego works in 200+ countries and can charge six devices at the same time. It’s really the best charger out there! We’re happy to work with you in any way possible. Please send all inquiries to hello@pacum.co

Risks and challenges

The first round of production is already done! We have all the certificates and permits we need.

Charwego is READY for production.

The one thing that is annoying is (surprise, surprise!) Covid. We don’t know what’s going to happen in the coming months. A new wave could make our manufacturer slow down production.

That would slow down the shipping time...

We are already really far ahead. The way it looks now? The only thing that could delay the product is the pandemic. But there is one thing we can guarantee:

You will have full transparency. We will tell you *Anything* that’s going on. We will also work our butts off to get everything done quickly.

Every backer gets invited to our VIP Facebook Group.

There you can get updates and ask questions :)

story:
Website: www.mappgoworldwide.com

Inspired by the development of social apps combined with our passion for technology, a team of Italian students, Filippo Ugo, Giovanni Pignatelli, Tommaso Tofacchi and Federico Magri, decided to develop an application which could present a new way of reviewing locations and events. The result was Mapp, an app that aims to provide its users with trustworthy reviews they can rely on. What is special about it (and what identifies it from Tripadvisor) is that it functions like a social network which will only allow the user to see the reviews of his/her friends. This makes them trustworthy since you know who reviewed the location. We are very excited about this project and we have plans for its evolution! Please help us achieve these goals by downloading and testing for yourselves. “Mapp – Go Worldwide!” is now available on the Apple App and we hope it will soon be available for Android. Quick link to: http://appsto.re/it/B-Ws5.i

Any that believe on the success Mapp could have are very welcome to help us adjust the problems and improve the present functions. 

We are going to need 1500€ to help us set up a team of professional developers in order to certify the apps quality and perfect its functions. With the team set up, which will cost around 1000€, we will use the spare money to start campaigning the app through famous websites and blogs in order to reach as many people and attract them into downloading and start using Mapp. 

Mapp really aims at allowing people to trust the reviews they see and at the same time being able to review anything. We think that reviewing shouldn't be limited to just restaurants and hotels, people should be able to share with their friends whatever they want, a new park that just opened and would be wonderful for a jog in the morning or a shop that has amazing stuff with low prices! If you know who reviewed the place, you know you can trust them, with most location reviewing apps you can see everybody's review, what makes you think that the bad reviews of a restaurant come from the owner of the restaurant in front?

What we dream is a social network that gives the people the opportunity to enter a bar because they know their friends said it's amazing, or giving them the chance to have a variety of cultural sightseeing places to go to during your trip to another country. We want a world wide network that people can trust. 

If you downloaded the app, you still might see problems or bugs, this is the reason we need your help to help us fix them and allowing you users a better and more efficient experience. Also, it would also be amazing if you could send us problems you have seen to ThAppStudio@gmail.com.

If we don't reach our 1500€ goal the money raised will anyway be used to fix as many problems we can so to grant you a perfect and functional app to use for your own commodity.

We know that making an app successful isn't easy, and we know that out of the hundreds of apps launched each day only so very few become famous, but we believe, that with your help, and with your trust in us, we will be able to repair our app, and launch it throughout the globe. Its not about us, its about an idea, that may improve your everyday lives and offer you a commodity for everyday use.

If you like our idea but can't or don't want to donate, please help us spread the word about Mapp and our campaign, use the Indiegogo share tools to send our campaign to everybody, help us in our mission to make our app perfect, and we shall promise you, a trustworthy utility built for you.

Thank you,

The Mapp team

story:
Travel With Purpose, a 501(C)(3) that focuses on empowering women and girls by generating projects that offer sustainable solutions to financially and emotionally support beneficiaries, announces its next mission in Fond des Blancs, Haiti alongside Haiti Projects for their Artisan Cooperative.

The Artisan Cooperative, founded in 1994, employs nearly 100 women at Fair Trade wages making heirloom quality, handcrafted embroidered and knit products.  Their products are sold online, at retailers and through events in the U.S. and in Haiti. 100% of the proceeds from the sale of these items go directly toward supporting the Haiti Projects artisans, providing them with a life changing income.

Travel With Purpose will be expanding the Artisan Cooperative with the goal of employing an additional 100 women by 2017.  By employing these women in rural Haiti, where land is barren and the unemployment rate is a staggering 75%, we will also be providing a future for nearly 400 children.  In addition, Travel With Purpose will also become a distributor in the U.S. and sell the products the artisans make in order to continue to provide an additional avenue of income for the project. 

To receive a tax exemption letter for your donation please email travelwithpurposejourneys@gmail.com. Thanks.

story:
Perk 1: FacebookLIVE Webinar in Chrome

I'm just going to say it, if your Facebook LIVE videos are boring or not a lot of people are interacting with them by leaving comments or reacting to it by liking or hearting it, then you need this!

This training is going to teach you everything you need to know when it comes running a webinar inside of Chrome and adding other elements over your LIVE Video.

You'll Be Able To Add:

  1. Powerpoint/Keynote presentations
  2. Fancy Animated Call-to-Actions
    1. "Like" this video
    2. "Heart" this video
    3. "Share" this Video
    4. Turn on Notification
    5. Leave a Comment
    6. Ask a Question
    7. Say "hi" Below
  3. Use Logo Animation
  4. Add Watermark
  5. Show Images/Quotes
  6. Play Videos
  7. Use Lower Thirds
  8. Product Launch Countdown
 

Do FacebookLIVE Mini Webinar

This concept is pretty simple, inside of just doing a LIVE vide with just your face on it, why not spruce it up a little with some flashy images or a presentation to better help teach your audience?

The idea is not to put on a full blown webinar, but instead add interest to your LIVE videos so you step out from the avalanche of bland LIVE videos your audience sees everyday.

 

Don’t want to do a Webinar?

This set up is not only for webinars but LIVE videos in general, it adds an extra flare to your on-camera presence, it lets your audience knows you’re serious about what you’re talking about.

Instead of a presentation, you can show your audience a video or an image of an inspirational quote and do an entire LIVE video around that. The possibilities are endless.

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I Need A Special Software? Yes, in addition to Chrome (which is free) you need a special software that'll allow you to choose what you want to show on your LIVE Video, it will allow you to switch from your camera to your presentation effortless. Module 1 of the training covers this topic in detail.

What's Price of the Software That I Need? The software is only $20, the price for two coffee, but it's one of the most powerful tool you can own! Most popular Software for FacebookLIVE can cost up to $500.

However, there is a Free version of the software you can use while you go through this training.

Why is Chrome Important? Because Facebook has a feature to use your Web Camera to go LIVE (instead of your phone) and the option to go LIVE consistently appears on your Facebook when you're using Chrome. Other browsers have this feature but Facebook seems to favor Chrome over the others.

Mac or Windows? Actually, it works on both platforms! The software runs comfortable and connects perfectly without a hitch!

Can I use a USB Mic? Yes you absolutely can! I would highly recommend it! Any USB Mic will work as long as it's installed and working on your computer.

What Kind of WebCam Do I need? Any web camera will do, as long as it's installed and working on your computer then you will be able to use it.

Will I Get to Use Those Fancy Animated Call-To-Actions? YES!! They are including in the training. 

Can I Preview The Animated Call-To-Actions? Yes you can! Just below this section, there is a video preview of the Animated Call-To-Actions

How Did You Get Your Logo Animation and How Can I Get Mine? My logo animation was designed by me, I'm an animator. Since your Logo Animation needs to be crafted by someone in order to fit with your brand, I have a service that allows you get your logo animated. Read more below

FacebookLIVE Call-To-Actions (Bonus)

The easiest way to get your audience to become interactive on your LIVE video is to show them what you want them to do, if they have to think about what you want them to do then that slows down the process. Instead show them an animation of what you want them to do and watch as the interactive in your LIVE videos skyrocket.


Here's a Preview of the included Bonus of Animated Call-to-Action you can use inside of your FacebookLIVE Webinar in Chrome

While you're LIVE talking to your audience, simply click any of those Call-To-Action to activate them, they'll take up the entire screen to prompt your videos to become more engaging with you and your content. 

 

Perk 2: Get Comfy On-Camera

​

 

Learn how to Hack Your Emotion so that your emotions start working with you, instead of against you. Most of the problems we face when we're on-camera is internal.

You'll Learn

  1. How to Effortlessly project a warm and positive vibe
  2. Bring out your most happy and sincere smile
  3. Make your audience feel like you are looking directly at them
  4. Speak with conviction when talking about abstract concepts
  5. Elminate negative self-talk
  6. Destroy the Fear of being judged
  7. Develop a richer tone of voice
  8. Kill monotone speaking

This training is based on flipping the emotions you experience to work with you to achieve your goals instead of working against you.

Instead of feeling nervous

we can replace that emotion with excitement because emotions can replace other emotions. However, you can't replace an emotion with rational thoughts, you can suddenly decide to not love someone people it's the logical thing to do, likewise with being comfortable on-camera, you can't suddenly decide not to feel fear or nervousness because it's the logical thing to do.

This training is the BEST in the world to immediately start seeing results, some people see results in less than a minute, I'm not bragging, that's just a fact. The results in the Testimonial video montage is proof. It's THE BEST!

But if you want REAL results that'll last a lifetime, then all you need is 5 minutes a day to practice, 5 minutes is all you need to rewire how your emotions react to being on-camera.

story:
On June 17th, 1994 O.J. Simpson led police on a low speed pursuit across Southern California. As the world watched the stunning events on television, I could hear the news helicopters hovering above my summer camp a few miles away from Simpson’s home in Brentwood. Although I had no idea who O.J. Simpson was at the time, I could sense the enormous impact this moment would have on history.

 

Many years later I am still fascinated by the case, which is why I started doing The O.J. Tour. Although it started as just as hobby, The O.J. Tour is growing to into a full fledged attraction. To improve the tour, I’m asking for your help getting a white Ford Bronco, identical to the one used in the infamous chase.

 

There are actually two Broncos associated with the O.J. Simpson trial. O.J. was given a brand new 1994 Ford Bronco XLT by Hertz Rent-a-Car where the blood of Nicole Brown and Ron Goldman was eventually found. His best friend Al Cowlings owned a nearly identical 1993 model, which he used to help his friend evade the police that June afternoon. Since A.C.’s was the one from the chase, I feel that is the one I need to replicate. I’m looking for not only the same year, make, and model, but also a car in good cosmetic condition with low miles and similar interior.

 

Due to the Bronco’s iconic status among collectors, a car like that could cost as much as $18,000. I will need to account for repairs and maintenance, too- and let’s not forget tax, registration, and title transfer fees. My search is also limited to California due to the state’s strict emissions standards. Finding an exact replica may be difficult, but I need to be prepared when the opportunity comes along.

 

Driving the Bronco around Brentwood is going to attract a lot of attention, so I’ll have to make other part of the tour more legitimate. I’ll need to acquire a Transportation Charter Permit (TCP) number and carry commercial auto insurance. Doing that will require me to restructure certain aspects of the business. All of these things, of course, cost money.

 

But wait, there’s more…

 

My ultimate goal is to convert the back of the Bronco into a mobile O.J. Simpson museum. There are hundreds of pieces of memorabilia from O.J.’s football career and an equal number associated with the murder trial; hats, t-shirts, board games, dolls, pogs- not to mention countless books and television programs covering both subjects. I want to create a permanent display of these artifacts that can travel and be used for events. I already have a number of intriguing O.J. items but I want to set aside some money to grow and sustain the collection.

 

As a show gratitude for your support, we’ve put together some cool perks ranging from stickers and t-shirts to virtual tours for those unable to make it out to California to do the tour in person.

 

Before we can get started on any of this, however, I have to pay 10% to Paypal and Indiegogo and a somewhat larger percent to the IRS. I’m asking for $25,000, which I feel is just enough to make this a reality. If we raise more than our goal, or don’t come close at all, I’ll fulfil the prizes and donate the remainder to domestic violence charities.

 

If you’d like more information, or would like to take the tour in it’s current form please visit theojtour.com. Even if you can’t contribute financially, please consider helping by spreading the word on social media. I’m also totally available to discuss the tour and campaign on your podcasts/blogs/whatever. Please direct inquiries to info@theojtour.com. Anything and everything is appreciated. I’d be grateful forever if you helped me get this Bronco.

 

The campaign is set to end of June 17th 2017, the 23rd anniversary of the chase.

 

Thanks! Don’t squeeze the Juice!

story:
Why Giftbook Rocks?

Because it brings you even closer to your family, friends, colleagues…

This app will let us exchange gifts like never before.

All stores can register, so when your friend picks a gift for you, he/she can just pick it from stores around you. This way, now on any event your friends and family will be able to send gift to you, and you to them.

Pricing

Installing and using Giftbook is free. We ensure you buy gifts with price difference no more than 5% or even non, comparing to the retail prices available in store. We have to mention this because Giftbook users will frequently purchase gifts for friends abroad and we have to consider overheads.

How you get the gifts?

QR Code, as simple as that.

When a preset day comes you receive a notification, after that you can see gift details on your app or on our website. You also have a full list of gifts and their locations on a map. So you can just keep walking around your area after your birthday collecting your gifts. Each gift has 2 delivery options: pick up from store or delivery. In gift description, you can find Bar-code or QR-code (based on your location). While receiving the gift let the store or delivery guy scan your Bar-code or QR-code, this is how we will know you have received the gift. 

No Smartphone? Not an issue. Just print the Bar-code or QR-code and bring it to the store. 

Who we are?

We are an international team of passionate application developers from USA, Taiwan, Russia, and Korea. Our current main goal is to create Giftbook at its best so we all could finally enjoy sending and receiving gifts. 

The idea of creating Giftbook has come to our project leader in 2014. For 2 years we have been working on the idea, polishing each concept. And now finally it is time to introduce full Glory of Giftbook to the world.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The biggest challenge our team currently faces is to make Giftbook’s user experience at the highest level possible. We have tons of metadata to process and we need to polish our core algorythm. It only takes time, therefore it will be perfect.
  • Other big challenge and risk is time for development. We have set our deadlines and trying to bring Giftbook to live on time. With your help, we will be able to expand our team with few more professionals to make the project run faster and with even more cool ideas.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with all people around you. Let everyone know Giftbook is coming.

story:
*Click on perks to the right to read details about each perk ->

  • We will build and run THE FIRST SCHOOL on the island offering a FREE EDUCATION so that the children can have the same opportunities like the kids on the mainland!

  • We will organize and run THE FIRST BEACH CLEAN-UP PROJECT on the island in a fun way so that we can keep our beaches beautiful!

1. We need your DONATIONS to construct the hostel and school. Yes, you will be REWARDED :-)

2. We need YOU here! Part of the profits from the hostel will go towards operating costs for the school. We want the students to be able to attend FREE OF CHARGE!

3. You can VOLUNTEER at the school, help us run the beach clean-up project or simply promote our campaign! 

1. We have some of THE BEST BEACHES in Cambodia offering crystal clear waters, white sands &  beautiful sunsets!

2. You can sit back, RELAX and enjoy the views, wildlife & sunsets.

3. The island has plenty of ACTIVITIES to help keep you entertained throughout your stay.

4. The Island is only a SHORT FERRY RIDE from the mainland off the coast of Sihanoukville!

5. And of course FRIENDLY LOCALS!

1. You will be helping children receive a FREE EDUCATION and create FRIENDSHIPS!

2. You will be helping us keep the island CLEAN and BEAUTIFUL!

3. You will be supporting a local CAMBODIAN FAMILY BUSINESS.

4. You will receive AFFORDABLE PRICES!

KOH RIGHT HOSTEL & SCHOOL will hopefully start construction by the end of 2018 and OPEN in 2019 if all goes well!

Your SUPPORT will help us cover CONSTRUCTION COSTS such as Dorm Rooms (33%), Bungalows (16%), School (13%), Bar, Restaurant & Kitchen (8%), Landscaping(8%), Boats (11%), Bathrooms  (6%) and Generator (5%).

Unfortunately, construction costs are much higher on the islands due to the unique location. All materials/equipment must be shipped by boat and workers must live on the island during construction which adds to the cost.

Proposed Construction Design

We know everyone likes FREE STUFF & we know a lot of people like to be ACKNOWLEDGED, so that's exactly what you'll get!

  • Backers can choose from many perks that offer FREE CREDIT to use at the hostel. The more you DONATE, the more free credit you will receive!
  • All free credit backers will also have their name placed on the WALL OF FAME!
  • Backers can also choose to purchase an item for the bar, a building or school and the item will be NAMED after them!
  • And we are throwing in a free KOH RIGHT T-SHIRT OR SINGLET for all backers just because WE LOVE YOU that much!

Whether you're a SOLO traveler or want to SHARE your trip with a group or a friend, we've created the perfect perks for YOU! 

Which will you choose?

Cambodia sizes run small, order one size larger than usual!

  • Credits only good for use on products and services at Koh Right Hostel.

  • Leftover credit can not be exchanged into cash or refunded.

  • Perks DO NOT EXPIRE (except "Your private bungalow paradise" perk is only valid for 5 years).

  • You can transfer your credit to friends or family as a gift (excluding "Your private bungalow paradise" perk).

  • Perks with beers can be upgraded to cocktails & dorm room beds can be upgraded to private bungalows for an additional charge at check-in.

  • "Your private Bungalow Paradise" Perk is free ONLY for the purchaser for 5 years. Free stays can not be transferred to others. Max 2 people per stay. Max 30 days per stay. Non-transferable.

  • Singlets and T-shirts will only be given on arrival (except "Doin' It Right At Koh Right" Perk will be shipped).

  • You must email us at least 1 month in advance to confirm your stay and use your perk.

  • Estimated perk delivery time will depend on how quickly we can reach our goal to open Koh Right Hostel and School. We have set a goal for May 2019. All backers will be notified on the progress of construction and will be notified when the project is complete.

The Impact

  • You will help give children an EDUCATION that they otherwise wouldn't have!
  • You will help us keep our beaches CLEAN and BEAUTIFUL!
  • In the future we plan to operate sustainably on SOLAR ENERGY and grow all of our vegetables from our hostel GARDEN!

If you like our story and BELIEVE in our VISION, then please: 

  • SHARE this campaign on your social media or even with your local media to help SPREAD the word about Koh Right.
  • REFER travelers to our hostel so that they can contribute directly on the island whether it be staying at the hostel, helping with beach clean-ups or volunteering at the school.
  • FOLLOW us on Facebook @KOHRIGHTHOSTELS, on Instagram @KOHRIGHTHOSTEL and Snapchat @ KOH.RIGHT for news and updates!

*For any questions about our campaign or the perks, please check out our FAQ, leave a comment or email us at KohRightHostels@gmail.com

From EVERYONE at KOH RIGHT HOSTEL...We would like to THANK YOU for checking out our campaign page. It means the WORLD to us! We hope you become a believer in KOH RIGHT HOSTEL and we are so THANKFUL for everyone that will be helping us on this journey. 

Together we GROW; together we MAKE A DIFFERENCE!

You will help us keep our beaches CLEAN and BEAUTIFUL!
In the future we plan to operate sustainably on SOLAR ENERGY and grow all of our vegetables from our hostel GARDEN!




If you like our story and BELIEVE in our VISION, then please: 


SHARE this campaign on your social media or even with your local media to help SPREAD the word about Koh Right.

REFER travelers to our hostel so that they can contribute directly on the island whether it be staying at the hostel, helping with beach clean-ups or volunteering at the school.

FOLLOW us on Facebook @KOHRIGHTHOSTELS, on Instagram @KOHRIGHTHOSTEL and Snapchat @ KOH.RIGHT for news and updates!

*For any questions about our campaign or the perks, please check out our FAQ, leave a comment or email us at KohRightHostels@gmail.comFrom EVERYONE at KOH RIGHT HOSTEL...We would like to THANK YOU for checking out our campaign page. It means the WORLD to us! We hope you become a believer in KOH RIGHT HOSTEL and we are so THANKFUL for everyone that will be helping us on this journey. Together we GROW; together we MAKE A DIFFERENCE!

story:
> For the text in English - please scroll down! <

Vi vill trycka en Tångguide!
Den blir tryckt på mjuk plast så du kan ta med den till stranden utan att vara rädd för att den ska bli förstörd. Den kommer att innehålla all information du behöver för att kunna plocka tio olika arter tång på ett hållbart och enkelt sätt. Vår förhoppning är att så många som möjligt ska ge sig ut och plocka de här godsakerna eftersom de smakar suveränt, är näringsrika, vackra och kan skördas utan att havet påverkas på ett negativt sätt. Vi älskar havet och vi är övertygade om att människor tar bättre hand om det i fall de plockar sin mat direkt ur vågorna. Vår dröm är därför att det ska bli lika självklart att plocka tång ur havet som det är att plocka svamp eller bär i skogen. Vi vill helt enkelt att människor ska återknyta banden till havet och den här tångguiden är vårt bidrag för att nå dit!

Vi som står bakom den här insamlingen är två universitetsbibliotekarier som sagt upp sig från sina jobb i stan och flyttat ut till havet i Bohuslän för att leva vår dröm. Vi vill ha mer tid till att plocka tång, kajaka och utveckla vårt företag Catxalot [catch-a-lot]


Vad vi behöver och vad du får

Vi har en färdig tångguide på datorn med fantastiska illustrationer och nu behöver vi din hjälp för att få ihop pengar till tryckningen. Dom 4000 USD som vi hoppas få ihop kommer att betala tryckningen och gör att vi kommer att kunna skicka ut den till alla er som beställer den redan i sommar. Om vi skulle få in mer pengar än vi ber om kommer vi att använda extrapengarna till att översätta guiden till fler språk och inkludera fler arter så att den fungerar längs fler kuster!
Alla illustrationer i guiden är gjorda av Maj Persson som förutom att vara en fantastiskt duktig illustratör dessutom är marinbiolog vilket naturligtvis borgar för att bilderna är både vackra och korrekta!
All layout är gjord av Rebecca Wessberg som har mer än tio årserfarenhet av grafisk design och vi gillar hur hon får våra saker att se ännu bättre ut än vi kunnat drömma om.

Ok, men vad händer om ni inte får ihop pengarna?

Uppdatering: Vi kommer att trycka guiden även om vi inte får in 100 %! 

Betydelse

Alla bidrag har betydelse och hur litet bidrag du än ger är vi tacksamma för ditt stöd och stolta över att du tror på vår idé.

Alger och tång är en ny råvara i vår del av världen som har potentialen att ge massor med människor mat på bordet utan att förstöra miljön. Genom att lära dig att plocka olika sorters tång kommer du att få en ny insikt i hur havet kan vara en källa till näring i framtiden.

Efter att ha hållit en mängd lyckade workshopar, föredrag och tångsafaris från Lofoten i norr till Göteborg i söder är vi nu redo för nästa steg!

Risker och utmaningar

Tångguiden ligger färdig i datorn redo att tryckas och vi har fått en offert av tryckeriet som är giltig tills den här insamlingen är avslutad. Så det enda som skulle kunna gå fel nu är om vi inte får ihop tillräckligt mycket pengar!

Andra sätt du kan hjälpa oss

Sprid gärna länken till den här sidan till alla du tror kan vara intresserade!

OBS!

Om du vill beställa en tångguide eller något annat måste du klicka dig in på en "Perk" i högerkolumnen. Annars har vi ingen aning om vad du vill beställa & får inte din adress heller. 
Frakt tillkommer. Vi kontaktar dig när guiden är klar ang. portokostnad.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

We want to raise money to print a laminated seaweed foraging guide that you can bring to the beach. It will show where and how you can find 10 different and tasty seaweeds and how to harvest them in a sustainable way. Our hope is to teach as many as possible how to pick these hidden vegetables of the sea because they are tasty, nutritious, beautiful, exciting and can be picked without a negative impact on the oceans. We love the ocean and we belive that people will act more responsible towards the ocean if they learn to pick their food directly from it's waters. Our dream is that it will someday be as natural for people to pick seaweed from the ocean as it is for Scandinavians to pick berrys and mushrooms in the forest. We want people everywhere to re-connect to the ocean - this guide is a crucial step in that direction!

We are two university librarians who quit our jobs in the big city and moved out to the edge of the ocean to be able to live our dream and forage for seaweed, spend more time in our kayaks and work in our small company Catxalot [catch-a-lot].

What We Need & What You Get

We have a complete guide with beautiful illustrations in our computer and now we need your help get it printed. The 4000 USD we hope to raise will cover the cost for printing the guide and will mean that we can start shipping to you guys already this summer! And if we get more money, then that will make it possible to translate the guide and print coming editions in more languages. The first version will be in Swedish.
All the illustrations featuring in the guide are made by Maj Persson who is not only an extremly talented artist but also a marine biologist.
The layout is made by Rebecca Wessberg with more than ten years experience as a graphic designer and we love the way she makes everything better then we ever thought it could.

Well what happens if the goal is not met?


Update: We will print it even if we don´t make it to 4000 USD.

The Impact

Every contribution matters to us. And no matter how small your contribution is we will be grateful and appreciate the fact that you support our cause.

Algae and seaweed is a novel food source in our part of the world and one that has the potential to feed a lot of people without a devastating effect on the environment. By learning which seaweeds to pick you get a new insight and awareness of the ocean as a source of healthy and tasty nutrition.

After three years of conducting lots of inspirering and successful workshops from Lofoten, Norway in the north to the island of Vrångö in the south we are now ready for the next step.

Risks & Challenges

The guide is ready to be printed and we have a price from the printer. So what could go wrong? Well basically nothing if we are able to raise the money to get it printed!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us share this campaign to everyone you think could be inerested!

story:
My name is Shawn Bouley & I am the Founder of The Rollick Hotel Co. I've spent almost 20 years managing world-class events such as the Winter Olympic Games, NFL Super Bowl, NCAA Men's Basketball Final Four, to name just a few.

One day I realized sold-out hotel rooms and lodging challenges were becoming a common occurrence at events of all types throughout the country (Super Bowl, Final Four, Coachella Music Festival, Bonnaroo Music Festival, Bassmaster Classic, Comic-Con, etc.) and decided to leverage my industry experience and relationships to take the 'NO' out of 'NO VACANCY' at sports & entertainment events and music festivals.

I founded The Rollick Hotel Co. to temporarily increase local available lodging with popup hotel villages for fans & event attendees, event workforce & services staff, and corporate brands...where they want to be.

And I need YOUR help to succeed.

What We Need & What You Get

Our team has produced a prototype hotel suite and need $50,000 to fully launch our next phase of operations.



Our first step is revealing our hotel suite at HD Expo (http://www.hdexpo.com) in Las Vegas in early May, the premier trade show for the hospitality industry.

The $50,000 will be used to transport the suite back & forth from our home base in Texas, and facilitate travel, site planning, and permits for our initial event clients, defray insurance expenses for the suite, cover legal costs to execute event contracts, and prepare for production of our initial inventory of hotel suite rooms.

When you launch an innovative new idea like a popup hotel with suites & rooms built from shipping containers, no matter how cool people may think the concept is, investors are very cautious and gun-shy until they see the concept work, when it's easy to invest.

We're asking you to join us on the leap of faith we've already taken by building a model hotel suite on our own. We've already met with several prospective event clients and these funds will help ensure we can deliver on our forthcoming event contracts.

Any and all funds will go towards the efforts and tasks described above. Less than $50,000 raised, and the process will continue but just go slower. More than $50,000 raised, the process will accelerate.  

The perks are simple, but we believe important to you when we're up & running, and instead of spending large amounts of our fundraising on swag & stuff, we are focusing on perks that we think are relevant & will be rewarding to you, and most importantly, will allow us to maximize our dollars and efforts to launch into the market quickly. 

The Impact

With hotel rooms at the Super Bowl averaging $1,000 per night, no hotel rooms within 10 miles of Coachella, SXSW short 6,000 hotel rooms, Little League World Series families having to stay an hour away from field, and numerous more anecdotes just like these at countless other event locations, you can see the need for The Rollick Hotel. Together we can take the 'NO' out of 'NO VACANCY!'

Risks & Challenges

Like any venture, there are plenty of operational risk & regulatory and financial challenges to our success but with our team's track record of managing events like the Olympics, Super Bowl, Final Four, Bassmaster Classic, World Police & Fire Games, and countless others, we are uniquiely qualified to navigate these challenges and execute this concept successfully. And we'd love to have you along for the ride...

Rollick & roll!

story:
Our Story

Hello World! I'm Stephanie M. Clark, a serial social entrepreneur. I have been very blessed to do what I love professionally for the past 20 years as an entrepreneur, marketer, founder of two non-profits, business coach & consultant. Two years ago, I decided my next business venture would be starting and operating a bed and breakfast and working within the hospitality industry. Through sharing my dream with friends, I met my business partner Kez Ford, a seasoned automotive exec, project manager and race car enthusiast. Together, we are now Dreamers Resorts.

We believe in divine connections and that God allows our paths to cross with others for a reason, a season and some times a lifetime.  This is our story, a story of how two people with big dreams were brought together to build a business and community in Jamaica! We hope you will help our dream become a reality so that you and others can come experience Rock Cliff Jamaica (RCJ) when we open in October!

God has brought other talented individuals to our "dream team" and we want to thank Hugh "Chef Irie" Sinclair, RCJ's culinary consultant & executive chef; Priscilla Dames, our resident corporate trainer; Tonii Sumner, our Group Sales Coordinator; Elizabeth Garcia, our Spa Consultant; Linda Stubbs, our Publicist; and Juan Ruiz, our talented videographer.  Our team members are all entrepreneurs who are contributing their time and talents to make our collective dreams come true! Thanks Dream Team!  Also, thank you to Blondie Ras Productions for usage of the Taste The Islands and Island Origins footage.

Through Rock Cliff Jamaica, we want to create a special place where people can come live, play and work without boundaries.  We want people to come and be inspired to dream big and to do what they love, just as we are doing.

We are offering really great perks and packages (50% off our regular room rates) during our campaign to help us reach our fundraising goal of $50,000 to support our renovations and transformation of Rock Cliff Jamaica into an all-inclusive, boutique luxury resort.

Our 5 Pillars of Success

We will measure the success of Rock Cliff Jamaica based on the above five (5) pillars of success that we will use to measure customer satisfaction and our community development efforts.

Experience Culture and Adventure With Us


Work in Progress

In January, we met with several Jamaican contractors and security firms while conducting a walk through of the property to highlight our renovations.  We look forward to hiring local contractors and vendors to make Rock Cliff Jamaica a beautiful, luxury resort for our campaign supporters.


Our Give and Take

Our Indiegogo fundraising goal is $50,000 which will go toward renovations for the following:
  • Welcome & Hospitality Center (for greeting and registering our guests)
  • Gift Shop & Beverage Bar (We have plans to create business opportunities for local artisans as well as other entrepreneurs and small businesses to sell their merchandise in our gift shop. We will also have a beverage bar that will provide speciality drinks to our guests including lattes, espressos and green and fruit smoothies)
  • Fitness Center (We have plans to build a full on-site gym for our guests to stay fit while at Rock Cliff Jamaica.)
  • Kitchen (Our kitchen will receive a total renovation making it a commercial kitchen that will provide three meals daily for our guests as well as catering for meetings and events)
  • Guest rooms (All rooms will be completely renovated with updated bathroom toilets, sinks, showers, and tiling suitable for a luxury resort). See rendering below for our Studio Suites on Cliff Level 1.


Our Perk Packages

When you give to our campaign you will take away some great perks and packages. We have created some really great perks and packages that will allow supporters of our campaign to pre-purchase packages at 50% off the regular room rates only through March 30, 2016.  Packages can be used at Rock Cliff Jamaica between October 2016 - October 2017 excluding black out dates.  Applicable sales tax apply. Bookings are available on a first-come, first-serve basis and are based on availability during the travel dates previously mentioned.  See a summary of our packages below.

REFLECTION & RENEWAL ESCAPE (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $500

DIGITAL NOMADS, ENTREPRENEURS & WORKCATIONERS (5 NIGHTS/6 DAYS) ONLY $750

ROMANCING ON THE ROCK FOR COUPLES (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $1,000

VIP GRAND OPENING GUEST FOR TWO (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $2,000

HONEYMOON HAVEN FOR TWO (5 NIGHTS/6 DAYS) ONLY $2,500

GROUP GETAWAY UP TO 15 PPL (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $550 PER PERSON

GROUP GETAWAY UP TO 30 PPL (4 NIGHTS/5 DAYS) ONLY $500 PER PERSON

CORPORATE RETREAT UP TO 12 PPL (COST PER PERSON PER DAY ONLY $260)

After you have purchased your package and we receive confirmation from Indiegogo, you will receive an email from us providing details to book your travel dates between October 2016 - October 2017.  Group bookings will be managed by our Group Sales Coordinator.

Our Community Impact

This campaign is not only about helping us raise money to complete our renovations.  It's much bigger than us!  We have plans to create jobs in hospitality and construction as well as business opportunities for Jamaican citizens who will work on our renovations, provide artwork and merchandise for us to display and sell on their behalf, and who we will train and hire to work as part of our Rock Cliff Jamaica team.

Rock Cliff Community Development Initiative (CDI)

Our mission is two-fold: (1) to open and operate a luxury resort, Rock Cliff Jamaica (RCJ) that will provide a five star hospitality and cultural experience for tourists and world travelers; and (2) to position Rock Cliff Jamaica as an anchor institution and catalyst for community development that creates economic, educational and empowerment opportunities that support the social well-being of Jamaican citizens.

Through the Rock Cliff Community Development Initiative, we plan to acquire an adjacent property that will become the Rock Cliff Culinary, Hospitality & Business (CHAB) Training Center anchored by Dreamers Restaurant which will service our resort as well as provide on-the-job training and employment to graduates of CHAB.

The Rock Cliff CDI model includes:


Stephanie M. Clark, COO, Dreamers Resorts, LLP has extensive experience working in the areas of economic and community development in underserved communities in Michigan (Detroit), New Jersey (Somerset, Newark & Camden), Georgia (Atlanta), and Florida (Miami). With her expertise, vision and vast national network, she will lead the Community Development Initiative in Jamaica.

Risks Equals Rewards

Nothing of value and with great reward comes without taking risks and dealing with challenges.  Taking risks and dealing with challenges is second nature to most entrepreneurs, including both of us. We are big dreamers and risk takers, but we are strategic in our approach and we take adequate time to write our plans before implementation.  We have also leveraged our national networks to seek out guidance from seasoned hotel operators and managers. We have been very fortunate to have people in our network who are from Jamaica or know people in Jamaica, who have been very instrumental in introducing us to key government officials, tourism agencies and reliable business owners that have helped us gain knowledge about the landscape of Jamaica and the hospitality industry.  Taking the time to plan and connect with the right people will help minimize our risk level and help us anticipate and resolve challenges we may encounter along the way.  We do not claim to know everything about the hotel business so we will continue to seek knowledge from our advisors who work in management at some of South Beach's finest boutique hotels. We will also hire experienced professionals during the construction phase to ensure will have the most knowledgeable project manager and contractors with verified track records to meet our deadlines to ensure an October opening.

As a marketer for the past 20 years, I have worked on several large construction projects in the US such as the world's largest Museum of African American History which opened in Detroit. I worked closely with the general contractor and spearheaded the community relations, marketing and public relations functions for the museum.  It opened in 1997 as a world class cultural institution.  I am looking forward to opening Rock Cliff Jamaica as a world class luxury resort.

We plan to become connected with hotel and tourism trade associations in Jamaica and the U.S. and will aggressively seek out opportunities to gain additional knowledge to ensure we are positioned to address future operational challenges.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope you will support this campaign by purchasing a package to Rock Cliff Jamaica or one of the other perks that fit your budget.  Please help us spread the word and share our campaign with your social media networks by using the Indiegogo sharing tools.

We look forward to sharing the progress of our construction milestones and details about our grand opening.  We especially look forward to hosting you at Rock Cliff Jamaica! Thank you so much for your support!

God has brought other talented individuals to our "dream team" and we want to thank Hugh "Chef Irie" Sinclair, RCJ's culinary consultant & executive chef; Priscilla Dames, our resident corporate trainer; Tonii Sumner, our Group Sales Coordinator; Elizabeth Garcia, our Spa Consultant; Linda Stubbs, our Publicist; and Juan Ruiz, our talented videographer.  Our team members are all entrepreneurs who are contributing their time and talents to make our collective dreams come true! Thanks Dream Team!  Also, thank you to Blondie Ras Productions for usage of the Taste The Islands and Island Origins footage.

Through Rock Cliff Jamaica, we want to create a special place where people can come live, play and work without boundaries.  We want people to come and be inspired to dream big and to do what they love, just as we are doing.
We are offering really great perks and packages (50% off our regular room rates) during our campaign to help us reach our fundraising goal of $50,000 to support our renovations and transformation of Rock Cliff Jamaica into an all-inclusive, boutique luxury resort.
Our 5 Pillars of Success

We will measure the success of Rock Cliff Jamaica based on the above five (5) pillars of success that we will use to measure customer satisfaction and our community development efforts.
Experience Culture and Adventure With Us





Work in Progress
In January, we met with several Jamaican contractors and security firms while conducting a walk through of the property to highlight our renovations.  We look forward to hiring local contractors and vendors to make Rock Cliff Jamaica a beautiful, luxury resort for our campaign supporters.



Our Give and Take

Our Indiegogo fundraising goal is $50,000 which will go toward renovations for the following:

Welcome & Hospitality Center (for greeting and registering our guests)
Gift Shop & Beverage Bar (We have plans to create business opportunities for local artisans as well as other entrepreneurs and small businesses to sell their merchandise in our gift shop. We will also have a beverage bar that will provide speciality drinks to our guests including lattes, espressos and green and fruit smoothies)
Fitness Center (We have plans to build a full on-site gym for our guests to stay fit while at Rock Cliff Jamaica.)
Kitchen (Our kitchen will receive a total renovation making it a commercial kitchen that will provide three meals daily for our guests as well as catering for meetings and events)
Guest rooms (All rooms will be completely renovated with updated bathroom toilets, sinks, showers, and tiling suitable for a luxury resort). See rendering below for our Studio Suites on Cliff Level 1.





Our Perk Packages

When you give to our campaign you will take away some great perks and packages. We have created some really great perks and packages that will allow supporters of our campaign to pre-purchase packages at 50% off the regular room rates only through March 30, 2016.  Packages can be used at Rock Cliff Jamaica between October 2016 - October 2017 excluding black out dates.  Applicable sales tax apply. Bookings are available on a first-come, first-serve basis and are based on availability during the travel dates previously mentioned.  See a summary of our packages below.

REFLECTION & RENEWAL ESCAPE (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $500



DIGITAL NOMADS, ENTREPRENEURS & WORKCATIONERS (5 NIGHTS/6 DAYS) ONLY $750



ROMANCING ON THE ROCK FOR COUPLES (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $1,000



VIP GRAND OPENING GUEST FOR TWO (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $2,000



HONEYMOON HAVEN FOR TWO (5 NIGHTS/6 DAYS) ONLY $2,500



GROUP GETAWAY UP TO 15 PPL (3 NIGHTS/4 DAYS) ONLY $550 PER PERSON



GROUP GETAWAY UP TO 30 PPL (4 NIGHTS/5 DAYS) ONLY $500 PER PERSON



CORPORATE RETREAT UP TO 12 PPL (COST PER PERSON PER DAY ONLY $260)



After you have purchased your package and we receive confirmation from Indiegogo, you will receive an email from us providing details to book your travel dates between October 2016 - October 2017.  Group bookings will be managed by our Group Sales Coordinator.   Our Community Impact This campaign is not only about helping us raise money to complete our renovations.  It's much bigger than us!  We have plans to create jobs in hospitality and construction as well as business opportunities for Jamaican citizens who will work on our renovations, provide artwork and merchandise for us to display and sell on their behalf, and who we will train and hire to work as part of our Rock Cliff Jamaica team.





Rock Cliff Community Development Initiative (CDI)


Our mission is two-fold: (1) to open and operate a luxury resort, Rock Cliff Jamaica (RCJ) that will provide a five star hospitality and cultural experience for tourists and world travelers; and (2) to position Rock Cliff Jamaica as an anchor institution and catalyst for community development that creates economic, educational and empowerment opportunities that support the social well-being of Jamaican citizens.

Through the Rock Cliff Community Development Initiative, we plan to acquire an adjacent property that will become the Rock Cliff Culinary, Hospitality & Business (CHAB) Training Center anchored by Dreamers Restaurant which will service our resort as well as provide on-the-job training and employment to graduates of CHAB.

The Rock Cliff
CDI model includes:
Stephanie M. Clark, COO, Dreamers Resorts, LLP has extensive experience working in the areas of economic and community development in underserved communities in Michigan (Detroit), New Jersey (Somerset, Newark & Camden), Georgia (Atlanta), and Florida (Miami). With her expertise, vision and vast national network, she will lead the Community Development Initiative in Jamaica.
Risks Equals Rewards
 Nothing of value and with great reward comes without taking risks and dealing with challenges.  Taking risks and dealing with challenges is second nature to most entrepreneurs, including both of us. We are big dreamers and risk takers, but we are strategic in our approach and we take adequate time to write our plans before implementation.  We have also leveraged our national networks to seek out guidance from seasoned hotel operators and managers. We have been very fortunate to have people in our network who are from Jamaica or know people in Jamaica, who have been very instrumental in introducing us to key government officials, tourism agencies and reliable business owners that have helped us gain knowledge about the landscape of Jamaica and the hospitality industry.  Taking the time to plan and connect with the right people will help minimize our risk level and help us anticipate and resolve challenges we may encounter along the way.  We do not claim to know everything about the hotel business so we will continue to seek knowledge from our advisors who work in management at some of South Beach's finest boutique hotels. We will also hire experienced professionals during the construction phase to ensure will have the most knowledgeable project manager and contractors with verified track records to meet our deadlines to ensure an October opening.



As a marketer for the past 20 years, I have worked on several large construction projects in the US such as the world's largest Museum of African American History which opened in Detroit. I worked closely with the general contractor and spearheaded the community relations, marketing and public relations functions for the museum.  It opened in 1997 as a world class cultural institution.  I am looking forward to opening Rock Cliff Jamaica as a world class luxury resort.


We plan to become connected with hotel and tourism trade associations in Jamaica and the U.S. and will aggressively seek out opportunities to gain additional knowledge to ensure we are positioned to address future operational challenges.  
Other Ways You Can Help
 We hope you will support this campaign by purchasing a package to Rock Cliff Jamaica or one of the other perks that fit your budget.  Please help us spread the word and share our campaign with your social media networks by using the Indiegogo sharing tools.
We look forward to sharing the progress of our construction milestones and details about our grand opening.  We especially look forward to hosting you at Rock Cliff Jamaica! Thank you so much for your support!

story:
About Scenic Rim Adventure Park

Scenic Rim Adventure Park is 680 acre property located in the picturesque Scenic Rim region. Just over an hour’s drive from Brisbane and the Gold Coast.

The Harris family own and operate the business and are passionate about four wheel driving and outdoor activities.  People often lose site of the real joy of nature, outdoors and quality time with others so the Harris's have opened their unique property for everyone to enjoy its natural beauty.

The park offers guests the opportunity to get back to nature with bush camping and basics enjoy and explore the outdoors.  With fourteen campsites throughout the entire property some appropriate for large groups and others more secluded and intimate you can almost be guaranteed to have a site to yourselves.

We are open seven days a week with office registration between 7am to 6pm daily. 

self explore 4wd tracks and off-road play areas, we offer over 20km of off-road tracks, we cater for all 4x4 vehicle types from stock standard through to the more extreme modified vehicles.

The property is oblong in shape with about 4km front to back with a large cliff running through the centre.  Standard tracks run up and down on both sides with cross tracks that include rock climbing, steep descents, the occassional mud hole and more challenging terrain for the more experienced four wheel driver.

We encourage imagination and creativity by supplying back to basic activities.  Located throughout the park you will find children play areas, mountain bike tracks, remote control tracks, obstacle course, man-made Endeavour maze, tyre max and bush walking trails.

During long weekends and school holidays we also run a variety of activities including hill water slides, star gazing, outdoor movies and orienteering games.

We aim to keep all our outdoor recreational activities as back to basic as possible using recycled materials.

When you spend time at Scenic Rim Adventure Park, we encourage you to leave the modern world behind and be self sufficient with nature.

Brian and Wendy have poured in every little bit of their live savings to keep this property open.  They have gone from right out owners of the beautiful property to now having the maximum mortgage the banks will loan. 

The whole experience has been extremely expensive and stressful for the entire family.

Brian and Wendy can no longer do this by themselves they do need financial assistance to complete the final court requirement to install line of sight pull off lanes at the six creek crossings along Tamrookum Creek Road estimated costs just over $70,000. 

We are seeking private financial assistance with the roadwork costs. In return we are offering different thank you options to the person who is donating to this funding.

We are so close, it would be disappointing to loose everything now.  Every little dollar helps. Thank you.

What We Need & What You Get

Brian and Wendy can no longer do this by themselves they do need financial assistance to complete the final court requirement to install line of sight pull off lanes at the six creek crossings along Tamrookum Creek Road estimated costs just over $70,000. 
This funding will pay for the stop go road workers, pull off clearing and road base and road signage.

To thank you for donating and helping us cover this final cost. We are offering the following rewards for your donation.

$10.00 donation - Thank you, You'll receive 10% off discount on your next visit to Scenic Rim Adventure Park.

$50.00 donation - Thank you, You'll receive 1 day park pass

$100.00 donation - Thank you, You'll received a family pass which includes two days entry to the park and one nights camping for two adults and two children

$200.00 donation - Thank you, You'll receive a driver awareness voucher which includes lunch and park entry

$500.00 donation - Thank you, You'll receive driver awareness voucher which includes lunch and park entry, plus four days entry to park and three nights camping for two adults and two children

$1000.00 donation - Thank you, You'll receive free entry into Scenic Rim Adventure Park for a year.  Advertising in the park and a track named after you.

$10,000 donation - Thank you, Lifetime entry to Scenic Rim Adventure Park for two adults and two children, track naming rights and campsite naming rights.

You can make a difference

The benefit of completing this condition, means that this unique property will stay open to the general public to be enjoyed.  Plus Scenic Rim Adventure Park will request a change of use to allow unregistered vehicles back on the property and increase the number of visitors on a daily basis.

Thank you for taking the time to read and understand our story.  We thank you for your consideration.

story:
How it started...

Just imagine you are sitting in a fancy restaurant and decide to order wine. The wine menu comes and all you see are question marks when you look at the names. You remember tasting a red wine at a party, and a friend told you it was a dry caber something and you liked it. This one says dry and the name looks the same, so does that mean they are similar? You don’t know. Why is this wine so expensive compared to the other ones? You don't know. You decide to just order it and the sommelier brings it to your table. Time for a taste! You try your best not to look like a fool and say the wine is OK, because you think it’s OK, but why is it OK? You don't know.

That was me...

I searched for classroom courses and online courses, because I wanted to know more about wine, but with a full-time job and a family with 2 kids I couldn't find the time to do either of those. I decided to take a break from my job and partnered with a French Wine Maker Chantal Smeets and went to Bordeaux to learn more about wine and created a course for people like me. A fundamental course that is easy to watch and could be done by everyone at their own pace.

We created “Wine Xpert in 8 Days”.

 

Now we want to teach you more about the wonderful world of wine, and our starting point is Germany. A top ranked wine country with amazing wines and very talented winemakers with vision. We will take you to the iconic vineyards that makes German wine so authentic and interview the great minds of future German wine making. Who can better guide us than my good friend German Specialist Master of Wine Romana Echensperger.

We will travel from the Ahr valley where we will cross the Mosel and head for Rheingau, Rheinhessen, Nahe, Pfalz and Baden. On our journey we will travel to these wineries and show you the specific regions and its unique soil types and will interview the winemakers from these beautiful wineries:

  • Weingut Kreuzberg
  • Weingut Loersch
  • Schloss Johannisberg
  • Weingut Dreissigacker
  • Weingut Heitlinger
  • Sekthaus Raumland
  • Weingut Jurgen Leiner
  • Weingut von Buhl

We will guide and educate you in the German wine world so you can enjoy their wine and also order them with confidence next time in your favorite restaurant.

To finish this beautiful production we do need your help. Please help us realize our dream to educate.

We will use the funds for traveling, accommodation, equipment, filming, editing, translating for subtitles and also for improving our current website. We hope to realize this production in December 2016.

story:
Evolution of the HSB Flight Park

By supporting our cause to develop a premier US flight park, you will become a part of something so big that it will forever change freeflight sports in America. We’re dedicated to growing our industry in a very positive light and we promise to not only expose the sport but to show it done properly and in a safe manner. We will put the future of the sport over anything else!

Are you passionate about Free-Flight sports?

You can trust that Horseshoe Bend Flight Park, LLC and owners, Scott Edwards and Justin Boer will follow through with the Flight Park development plans. We have been chasing this dream for nearly a decade and the perfect opportunity with the perfect land owner has been secured. Here’s what we’ve been up to so far;

  • We obtained a contract license to use the site for all free flight and camping activities.
  • A completed application has been submitted to PASA and the USHPA RRRG to operate a Flight School from the Flight Park. Early indications show an upcoming approval.
  • We expect to gain approval for a Conditional Use Permit for Boise County commercial recreational operations on Aug 17th, 2017.

The ducks are in a row and the ball is rolling, now we’re picking up momentum. Our path with this private 910 acre property is clear and someday we’d like to earn a reputation as a premier, world class flight park.

Scott Edwards is a Boise local who works hard to provide for his family; 3 great kids and a beautiful wife. He found the sport of speedflying in 2008. Shortly after that he could be found frequently flying around Horseshoe Bend, ID. It was fate that he ended up meeting a real nice land owner of the property he happened to be hiking up to go fly! The owner happily agreed to let Scott and his friends fly on his property. Even gave them a ride to the top! Over the years they built a solid relationship. One day during a safety meeting, Justin Boer and Scott were talking about what their dreams and visions are for the sport we are so passionate about. About a year later and a lot of hard work, here we are! Scott had the location and Justin brings to the table an extensive training program and close ties with major industry manufacturers. Justin has been instructing paragliding and speedflying as a certified USHPA Avd/Miniwing/Tandem Instructor for the past 8 years. Since 2013, he’s lived in HI focusing on recovery from a spinal cord injury. Because of that, he’s deeply involved with adaptive sports, enjoys inspiring other athletes and is developing an adaptive paragliding non-profit organization. This will eventually fit very well at the HSB Flight Park because it is such a reliable, safe and beautiful site to fly at.

Our goal with this campaign is to raise enough funds to properly set up and develop a flight park that offers safety training on forgiving terrain and reliable conditions, employment opportunities, equipment demos, and a super fun place to hang out! The Flight Park will unite pilots from around the world and strengthen our community in the US. This campaign is important to us because the future of our sport is depending on positive exposure, safety training and flying sites that build up the community and that’s what we want to be able to provide with HSB Flight Park.

By contributing to our cause you will be helping us achieve something of such a magnitude that it will go down in the history books of the sport of paragliding. We will build the largest and most renowned Flight Park in the US.

What We Need & What You Get

Here’s some things we need (money raised from this campaign goes 100% towards these items):

  • 2x Shuttle Vehicles
  • Big Shade Area (metal or black shade cloth with grommets)
  • 2x Shipping Container
  • Garage Doors
  • Solar Power Kit
  • Future Restroom and Shower Building
  • Picnic Tables
  • Astroturf Launches & at Shaded Home Base Area
  • Sun Shade Tents
  • Lawn Mowers (riding?)
  • Weed Wackers
  • Rakes & Shovels
  • Material for Fires Pit/BBQ
  • Generators
  • Wood (for equipment shed and shade construction)
  • Pavers
  • Sand
  • Gravel
  • 12x 1st Aid Kits
  • 12x Fire Extinguishers
  • 2x Snake Bite Kits
  • Signage Material
  • Holding Tank (showers & drinking water?)
  • Hand Wash Station

Here’s some things that we are currently working on:

  • Mowing & Grading 20+ acres for LZs (so far by donated push mowers)
  • Mowing 3+ acres for Launches and Access Roads (so far by donated push mowers)
  • Mowing & Grading 2+ acres Camping Area (so far by donated push mowers)
  • Spring Fed “Rinse Off Station”
  • Building Kitchen (need shipping containers first)
  • Removing Posts, Corral, 1 Mile+ Barbed Fencing (and all other obstacles in LZ areas)
  • Electricity, Wifi, Cell Phone Booster and Well for Drinking Water (future)Signage

We set the funding amount to $50,000 because we will have at least that amount of costs going into the preliminary development. Future projects will exceed this amount as we have ideas about, but not limited to, a restaurant/bar in the LZ.

How exciting is it to be involved from the beginning of something that will change so many people’s lives?! Excited is an understatement. We are offering some really amazing perks for your generous donations and we’ll put you on our newsletter so you can always stay updated with the latest improvement to the park. When you donate to this campaign you instantly become part of a very special community and we consider you family. We’ll do our best to have our park in top shape so we can be there to cater to every pilot and non-pilot member’s needs. Even if we do not meet our goal, all the money raised will go directly in to the park improvements.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge so far other than all the physical labor of building the Flight Park, is going to be the public hearing to get our Conditional Use Permit on Aug 17th. In addition, we have spent a ton of time preparing for the Flight School insurance through PASA and the RRRG and we’re currently entering the final stages for approval. There is no doubt, we will succeed with both of these important stages.

We are qualified to overcome these hurdles because we spent countless hours preparing plans for any scenario that may occur at the Flight Park. We’re ready to answer any questions that may arise and the community is very much supporting our efforts for the HSB Flight Park.

Other Ways You Can Help

It’s totally understandable that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. We are looking for assistance with any items on the above list, maybe you have a connection for a discount, have something laying in your garage or wouldn’t mind coming out to the park and getting your hands dirty. There’s lots of work to do and we welcome any type of help from our family, of course the cooler will always be full of cold beverages.

Another effective way to support our campaign would be to write a quick note sharing this page on your social media pages, it’s super easy to use the Indiegogo share tools. Email, message or text your friends and family showing your enthusiasm, passion and desire for the success of HorseShoe Bend Flight Park. We are so grateful for all of you that have and will spread the word of mouth! It’s been a great journey to get to this point and we’re ready to make some noise about the premier flight park location in Horseshoe Bend, ID.

Mahalo, Gracias, Arigato, Khob Chai, Obrigado, Danke, Grazie, XieXie, Spasibo, Merci, Chur, Мерси, Dik, Hvala Vam, Teşekkür Ederim, Gomabseubnida, Takk,

Thank You!

Wood (for equipment shed and shade construction)
Pavers
Sand
Gravel
12x 1st Aid Kits
12x Fire Extinguishers
2x Snake Bite Kits
Signage Material
Holding Tank (showers & drinking water?)
Hand Wash Station
Here’s some things that we are currently working on:
Mowing & Grading 20+ acres for LZs (so far by donated push mowers)
Mowing 3+ acres for Launches and Access Roads (so far by donated push mowers)
Mowing & Grading 2+ acres Camping Area (so far by donated push mowers)
Spring Fed “Rinse Off Station”
Building Kitchen (need shipping containers first)
Removing Posts, Corral, 1 Mile+ Barbed Fencing (and all other obstacles in LZ areas)
Electricity, Wifi, Cell Phone Booster and Well for Drinking Water (future)Signage
We set the funding amount to $50,000 because we will have at least that amount of costs going into the preliminary development. Future projects will exceed this amount as we have ideas about, but not limited to, a restaurant/bar in the LZ.How exciting is it to be involved from the beginning of something that will change so many people’s lives?! Excited is an understatement. We are offering some really amazing perks for your generous donations and we’ll put you on our newsletter so you can always stay updated with the latest improvement to the park. When you donate to this campaign you instantly become part of a very special community and we consider you family. We’ll do our best to have our park in top shape so we can be there to cater to every pilot and non-pilot member’s needs. Even if we do not meet our goal, all the money raised will go directly in to the park improvements.Risks & ChallengesThe biggest challenge so far other than all the physical labor of building the Flight Park, is going to be the public hearing to get our Conditional Use Permit on Aug 17th. In addition, we have spent a ton of time preparing for the Flight School insurance through PASA and the RRRG and we’re currently entering the final stages for approval. There is no doubt, we will succeed with both of these important stages.We are qualified to overcome these hurdles because we spent countless hours preparing plans for any scenario that may occur at the Flight Park. We’re ready to answer any questions that may arise and the community is very much supporting our efforts for the HSB Flight Park.Other Ways You Can HelpIt’s totally understandable that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. We are looking for assistance with any items on the above list, maybe you have a connection for a discount, have something laying in your garage or wouldn’t mind coming out to the park and getting your hands dirty. There’s lots of work to do and we welcome any type of help from our family, of course the cooler will always be full of cold beverages.Another effective way to support our campaign would be to write a quick note sharing this page on your social media pages, it’s super easy to use the Indiegogo share tools. Email, message or text your friends and family showing your enthusiasm, passion and desire for the success of HorseShoe Bend Flight Park. We are so grateful for all of you that have and will spread the word of mouth! It’s been a great journey to get to this point and we’re ready to make some noise about the premier flight park location in Horseshoe Bend, ID.Mahalo, Gracias, Arigato, Khob Chai, Obrigado, Danke, Grazie, XieXie, Spasibo, Merci, Chur, Мерси, Dik, Hvala Vam, Teşekkür Ederim, Gomabseubnida, Takk,Thank You!

story:
The ECO Gecko is a jungle bed and breakfast on an island paradise. The property is located within Plastic Bottle Village, on Isla Colon, Bocas Del Toro, Panama. Let us help you disconnect from daily life and relax, recharge, explore. There's something for everyone, with beautiful beaches, island hopping, jungles, reefs, kayaking, e-bikes, snorkeling, diving, horseback riding, atv adventures, world class surfing, dolphins, turquoise/blue clear waters, dart frogs, sloths, monkeys, toucans, parrots, parakeets and much more. 

We will be constructing as ECO friendly as possible without sacrificing comfort. Our plans are for solar, rain catchment and as many PET bottles as we can use. This will at least help to offset the plastic bottles we have used in our lifetime. 

We love to host! The ECO Gecko is not only a place to stay on vacation, but an experience. We want to help you have the BEST Bocas Experience Possible!

The Vision

Imagine waking up in the morning and having great tasting coffee, while watching butterflies and hummingbirds, as you look out over the garden in bloom. Listen to the sounds of the howler monkeys in the distance. Watch the fish in our stream right off the patio. Take a walk through the garden for a closer look at the flowers. While your admiring the gardens beauty, breakfast is being prepared for you in the shared outdoor kitchen. You can relax in our pool, do as much or as little as you want. There is something for everyone.

Finca Los Monos Botanical Garden 

Take a boat tour to other islands, marine preserves, discover beaches, snorkel, visit over-the-water restaurants, or rent an e-bike and explore on your own. Take one of the included kayaks and some snorkels down to the ocean access and explore the leeward side of the island. The water here is clear and flat. It is not far from our access to the coral reefs and mangrove lined coast.

There are four good beaches to visit right here on Isla Colon. The ECO Gecko is centrally located between them. All can be reached by taxi, golf cart or e-bike easily. 

One of the most popular surf breaks is just a few miles down the road at Paunch.

Visit Bocas town for some excellent dining and nightlife. There are also many shops, and supermarkets. 

The Current Plan

http://www.theecogecko.com

The ECO Gecko will have four rooms with bathrooms. There will be two up and two down. We will have a large deck on the second floor for everyone, with a garden view. Its the best spot to view the hummingbirds and butterflies.

The bottom floor patio will be bordered with a stream, and garden walking path. There will be a shared kitchen and dining on the bottom floor as well. This is where breakfast will be prepared and served. Guests are welcome to use this area anytime. We will have an enclosed outdoor shower for those days when the sand from the beach seems to be on everything!

Near the entrance we will have our covered, rental e-bike parking, as well as an open outdoor rinsing area. The pool will also be located right inside the entrance. We have plans for a natural looking waterfall on the far side. The wall in the back will be painted with murals around the pool area. The ECO Gecko will be solar powered with water catchment, and filtered reverse osmosis drinking water. There will be no need for air conditioning because we will design for maximum airflow with plenty of fans.

The oceans are filling with plastic which is an issue most people are aware of. We are committed to doing our part, and be part of the solution. 

We will offer all of our local knowledge to help you plan activities. We are committed to helping you have the best Bocas Experience possible! We love to host, so if you need anything just ask! 

The ECO Gecko Team

Owners: Kris and Jamie Hartman

Lando The Fish

Security: Piggy, Gidget, Otto

Pre-Construction Booking

All perks will have first priority booking! Once construction is complete we will open booking for you. Booking will be open to the public a week later. We are family friendly so just let us know if you have children coming along.

Timing

Property purchase is complete. We are currently in the dirt work phase of construction.

Funds

This project is financed through our own money. We are hoping to avoid bank loans and interest. We want to be able to pass this savings along to our guests. The bulk of the construction costs will be freed up when we sell our house and move. All of the funds from the pre-construction sale will give us the initial working capital, to make sure construction moves right along. We Thank You for your support in helping this dream become a reality! The Bocas Experience awaits!
